Reviews.Content: First, this took a while to get as it comes from China.  Pay attention to the delivery date.  It still came 10 days earlier than promised.  I only mention this because I didn't pay attention and wondered when it would show up.  Anyway I have an HP iPaq PDA that holds a lot of my day to day info and it is not getting younger. I don't want the data on my smartphone as I don't want it hacked.  I need to replace the PDA before it dies.  Looking at replacement costs was eye opening to say the least, 500 smackers.  Forget about it.  Then I thought, hey get a 7" tablet, bigger screen and lots of apps.  I didn't want anything too expensive as it would be an offline one or two use device.  I saw that the Zeepad had a lot of good reviews and got one.  I've had it for several weeks and have punched a lot of data into it.  It is slow and punching data in is time consuming as sometimes the character doesn't register.  But for my purposes, I don't care as I will be inputting once and reading hundreds of times.  As I said slow, you click and then wait 3 or 4 secs but I am a very patient person and it doesn't bother me that much, though I gave 4 stars because of it.  The charger's plug to the tablet is longer than the socket on mine so it doesn't fit all the way in but it charges.  Do not force the plug into socket or you may break it.  One review says the prongs to the wall socket broke, I checked to see if mine were loose and I recommend you do the same.  Bottom line, this is an $80 tablet not a $200 tablet and you have to expect it will not work the same.  If you are looking for an all around excellent, fast 7" tablet get the Kindle Fire, if you need it for a one or two use device I recommend the ZeePad.

Reviews.Title: Great value!!
Reviews.Author: Ashton Brereton
Reviews.Content: I wanted a fully functional tablet that would allow me, wirelessly, to access the internet, check and write emails, and access files on computers on my home network - from anywhere in or around my home - at a price below $100. The Zeepad 7.0 cost me $81.95 - delivered,  It does everything I wanted - flawlessly. The only reason I don't give it five stars is that it does not have a backward facing camera - so I can't can't scan documents. The front-facing camera works perfectly. So, in sum, I recommend it unreservedly - at the price.UPDATE:I have been using the Zeepad more often now and found that the built-in browser was somewhat slow - taking seconds to access main pages for sites such as CNN, NBC and BBC - and occasionally the browser froze. So, I installed Opera Mini for tablets (free) and found the increase in speed of access to web pages was dramatic. Access is now in less than a second, the formatting of the pages was changed to suit the Zeepad screen, the font size was automatically increased, scrolling is a breeze and all the stories and information are available. This free browser has, for me, significantly improved the capability of this budget tablet.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Joe Urbach
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this item.  It is the perfect starter tablet or would be great for kids. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great so far!!
Reviews.Author: Alicia
Reviews.Content: So far it works great and it got here faster than it said it would,it took about a week and a half.Thanks, the wifi does not work well at all.

Reviews.Title: Excellent affordable tablet
Reviews.Author: S. TERRY
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift. No complaints at all. Very good product and fast delivery. Will look for this or similar products in the future.

Reviews.Title: Nice tablet!
Reviews.Author: L. Hiles "Dingo"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Zeepad 7.0 for my 12yo grandson and haven't been disappointed. For the price, it's a great beginnner tablet. I like the fact that it uses google apps, he has many choices. The only downside is that it was difficult to set up because the choices were in Japanese?  Somehow, my daughter was able to set it up in English. We have had no problems since.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Chuggs
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use as a toy, basically. I didn't need it to do much, so in that aspect it's pretty good. If you need a high-end tablet, this is not it. It freezes on me sometimes and the touch screen is quirky. The camera is surprisingly sharp and the vertical width is such that I can hold it with both hands and type using my thumbs like on my HTC Evo. I give it 4 stars b/c it's a fun toy, but it's just that...a toy.

Reviews.Title: Great For Everyone
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline M. Allen
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet. I have nothing bad to say about it. I like it because it comes in really clear. I would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: What a surprise!
Reviews.Author: Not So Shoe Gal
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 70-something mother-in-law, she has a very basic knowledge of electronics in general, so i was just hoping for something simple and functional.  This met all my expectations and more!  I played with it a bit to set it up for her and dound it very easy to navigate, good picture, responsive screen.  Don't put it head to head with an ipad or kindle, it'll just hurt Zeepad's feelings! ;)  Its a good, simple little tablet to use for watching knitting videos on youtube!

Reviews.Title: I Love It!
Reviews.Author: Deidre Lynn Salcido
Reviews.Content: My nephew will love this...he hasn't seen it yet.  I heard the Android technology was amazing so I purchased this over a Kindle.  I like the slim, lightweight device.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great Service!!!
Reviews.Author: FeFeG
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item through PCTVSHOP and the service they provided was awesome!!! I have absolutely no complaints what so ever! Completely satisfied and most definitely a happy customer.

Reviews.Title: My kids love !!!
Reviews.Author: brucar11
Reviews.Content: Got it for my kids on christmas ! Very good for children they can play and watch movies . Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: eh. i suppose you get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Emberlynn
Reviews.Content: i was super excited when this came in the mail, my main use for it is that i can now type outside of my house without having t o bring my humongus 16 inch laptop around with me, and i can continue my short stories while im at work, and use my friends wifi for email and facebook. i suppose it does what its supposed to do. the camera is messed up, i guess it was manufactured wrong and the acual  camera lens is below the faceplate of the tablet, so iit constantly looks like you have your finger in front of the camera, which is a huge bummer. the touch screen is glitchy, so if i want to play draw something my drawings are always squigly, and thats a shame, it also takes a few tries to acually open something when you touch it. in one area the screen is kinda soft like a laptop, if you push on it with even the slightest bit of pressure it gets a black finger print on it, its hard to explain, but its like when you push on a laptop screen and it gets a shaded area for a few seconds. all in all this little thing has potential, but i think mine was an assembly line reject.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for kids
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: I haven't found anything that is disappointing about this tablet.  The kids love it and I no longer have them fighting over my KindleFire.  Plays all the apps and Kindle app for reading books without any problems so far.  I have even left the plastic film over the screen and they don't use the stylus (just fingers) and it is very responsive.  I'd highly recommend as a purchase for kids (or even adults) who don't want to pay a lot for one to knock around with.  I ordered 3 of them and they are all great!!

Reviews.Title: Worth the $ and good test for youngsters before investing in IPad or other high $ tablet
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: Came with crappy stylus, but convertor cables to allow USB devices to be added to the system and to be connected to other systems via USB, 512 memory sucks and unable to see how to add except for 32GB Micro SD card, but that is enough for my kids so that works. Plays music, video and video games well either streaming from NetFlix or of SD or flash drive. Kids can use it easy, I say overall def worthwhile.

Reviews.Title: Still can't believe this was only $70!!
Reviews.Author: annie79
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my 7 year old son. We charged it an played with it a little on Christmas Eve, and we were amazed how well it performed. I had thoroughly read the reviews, so I had high expectations, however, this blew them out of the water. Since it is only $70, and some people will have a hard time seeing past that to what is actually an awesome product, I will tell you the feature that I felt was lacking. To be fair, I have only used the camera one time, but the picture wasn't as great as on my phone (which takes incredible pics) or my husband's iPad, however, for a 7 year old, the pic was great. I am seriously impressed with this device, especially for a young person who isn't going to be doing too much other than playing games, and I strongly encourage this purchase, even if the price makes you leery. I would have paid more for this and still been just as happy!

Reviews.Title: Zeepa
Reviews.Author: Mr. Pilachi
Reviews.Content: good I love it I will recommend it to all my friends and will buy more in the future if I can still find them on sale.

Reviews.Title: Thought they were great at first but they started malfunctioning within a couple of weeks.
Reviews.Author: Samantha M
Reviews.Content: We ordered two of these as Christmas presents for our kids.  One came with a power button that was almost recessed into the unit.  However it still worked so we kept it.  That didn't last long and within a week or so of Christmas you could not turn the unit on at all.  We couldn't even turn it on to erase all the stored passwords to skype or Netflix etc.  We returned the unit.  My daughter's was still functioning well so we were planning on re-ordering another one for my son.  Thankfully we didn't because my daughter turned her's on yesterday morning and the tablet and reverted back to factory settings.  None of the games or other apps she had downloaded were on the tablet.  Needless to say I am returning it also.  If these tablets function properly they would be fantastic!

Reviews.Title: I never received the products
Reviews.Author: a very disappointed mom- from seller now prod...
Reviews.Content: untill now the items that I ordered from this seller never showed-up. It is really so hard when its Christmas time and my kids are so little thinking that Santa had put them on the naughty list, I have no family around and my kids only recieve gifts from us, so we ended up with no gifts this Christmas. My advice to this seller do not be in this business if you do not respect your customers. He also never replied or apologized.

Reviews.Title: I want my money back ASAP
Reviews.Author: Angry7879
Reviews.Content: This review doesn't even deserve 1 star!!!!! I am so disappointed and so is my little girl. She didn't even get a chance to see how it works. I charged it just like the instructions said to and guess what....it almost caused a an electrical fire in my home on Christmas Day charging only a few hours out of the total mentioned. I knew something was wrong when I initially plugged it in for the very first time ever,  and it got a little too hot for my taste. The thing burned a hole from the inside out, burned a hole in my carpet and luckily I caught it in time!!!!!! This could be a huge lawsuit but I'm being nice enough just to ask for my full refund. I will spend the extra money on a kindle fire. Maybe I was one of the unfortunate to receive a malfunctioned product but it was a fire hazard and I'm sorry but I can't say anything nice. You have to understand the fustration coming from our end. This product should be discontinued. Its my fault for a. being "cheap", and b. not doing my homework!!!

Reviews.Title: WOW REALLY
Reviews.Author: MAD
Reviews.Content: Wow suppose got the tablet on the 26. Having even gotta it yet smdh. I knew it wasn't coming before Christmas but the day after wasn't a big deal. They take your money so fast. Either I want the tablet or my money back.

Reviews.Title: Flustered
Reviews.Author: Diggity
Reviews.Content: I'm sure it will be great once I receive it!! It has changed dates twice as to when I'm going to receive it! The latest is after christmas! Man it must be busy sending packages out.

Reviews.Title: 4 year old hates it.
Reviews.Author: S Reese
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 4 year old a few months ago because she constantly takes my Ipad mini to watch cartoons on Netflix.  At first she liked it.  About a week went by when she started swiping my Ipad again.  I asked her why and she said that it wouldn't cut on.  So after charging it and getting it boot up she started to use it again(for 2 days).  Then she kept bringing it back to me because she didnt like the way the movies looked and that they kept stopping.  Thats when I started to play with it more. I noticed that the batties didnt last long at all.  3 to 4 hours on avarage.(if you are not watching netflix)  The screen has to be viewed head on like an old computer monitor and freezes all the time when using Nextflix.  I have seen better screens on cheap smart phones.  And this thing is slow!!  I though that the thing was gonna be A LOT faster than this.  So when a 4 year old can pick out things she doesnt like on a tablet like an adult would that should tell you something.  Maybe the Ipad spoiled her but either way I am shopping for another tablet for her Christmas present.  I'm going with the Kindle fire or the Kurio 7 this time.  I am tired of having to give up my Ipad yet again!!  LOL  Do yourself a favor and spend the extra money for a faster tablet!!

Reviews.Title: this thing is crap
Reviews.Author: Katie Quessenberry
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my daughter when it got here it turned on just fine but when I turned it off and back on it froze on me not letting me unlock it or power it off this thing was really cheaply made i would not recommend this to any one.

Reviews.Title: Did I get a different tablet?
Reviews.Author: Hjsmith
Reviews.Content: Uh.... All the good reviews... What? This tablet is JUNK! It takes 2 minutes for a page to load, and the camera you can only take pics of yourself. Please spend a few more bucks and get a real tablet! Lesson learned!

Reviews.Title: very happy customer
Reviews.Author: Melissa Dougan
Reviews.Content: We ordered this zee pad for our 13 year old daughter she found an app that lets her text for free no more 300 dollar phone bills and its just as nice as our name brand tablets are it shipped very quickly and we use it everyday couldn't be any happier with our purchase thankyou amazon .com we will be comming back for great deals in the future

Reviews.Title: Horrible customer service
Reviews.Author: Corinne
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son for Christmas. 2 weeks later the screen stopped responding. I emailed the company it is offered through and I am still waiting to hear back from them 3 weeks later. I should have spent the extra money for higher quality

Reviews.Title: Terrible do not buy
Reviews.Author: Networker59
Reviews.Content: This device was not only awful,  but we had the most difficult time returning it. It took us 4 times emailing  them regarding all the issues the device was having for them to understand I work with computers and networking for a living and the issues could not be resolved. They then waited until we had not only returned the device, but they had received it at their warehouse to again deny our claim. It took another 2 emails and 5 days before the matter was resolved. I couldn't be paid enough to try any product through Zeepad again.

Reviews.Title: Wallet computer
Reviews.Author: Rajan
Reviews.Content: It works great. I bought this for myself using to view movie from you-tube and contact others through skype etc.

Reviews.Title: no skype
Reviews.Author: Randy Carr
Reviews.Content: Tablet works great but will not sign in to skype,same result after a factory reset.not sure whose at fault but my daughters not happy about it.We have other tablets on the same skype account and have no problems

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY!
Reviews.Author: Jacktut
Reviews.Content: not at all what it states it is, its slow, force closes, and very cheaply made. worst investment EVER!you will regret this machine just as much as I do

Reviews.Title: Great Little Tablet
Reviews.Author: Guyfromtexas
Reviews.Content: I got two of these for my teenage boys 14 & 19 for a Christmas gift. Being as small and the awesome low price I was sort of nervous at first. Here we are over a month later and they continue to be their favorite gift. These tablets work great, the play store for aps is on there and picks up wifi with no problem. There hasn't been any crashes, malfuctions or any problems that I'm aware of. The only thing is I'm having trouble finding a cover for it but other than that I highly recommend this tablet and thinking of buying another for myself.

Reviews.Title: Won't be buying this ever again
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 7 year old.  I wanted to get him a tablet but didn't want to pay a whole lot for it.  I liked the system but the product itself was poorly made.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids not adults
Reviews.Author: athena
Reviews.Content: Brought it for my children because it didnt have alot of features just wanted educational games. the screen looks like plastic hard to see but good for your children to play games on, not good for netflix.but great for little children.

Reviews.Title: Just as expected
Reviews.Author: Cpj8456
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my 8 year old after reading the other reviews that suggested it would be good for kids.  It is perfect size for him and does everything he wants it to do at a price that I liked.

Reviews.Title: Defective, returned item but NO refund
Reviews.Author: Jbee05
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet for my daughters for Christmas. It did come in on time, but we decided to send it back because it was defective. Surges the web ok, but did not allow any apps to open.  Followed all the sellers directions for the return & I received confirmation from the USPS that they received the package.... Still NO refund & they have left the amazon marketplace.  Worthless product & scamming seller.  I should have bought a better product from a reliable seller, but I have never had something like this happen ordering through amazon before. I am very disappointed.  I hope and expect a refund or I will not be shopping at amazon again :(

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!
Reviews.Author: pissed off
Reviews.Content: NEVER GOT MY ORDER THESE PEOPLE WILL  TAKE YOUR MONEY AN WILL NEVER RESPOND TO YOU AGAIN!!!!!!! DON'T FALL FOR IT!!!! THESE PEOPLE STOLE MY CHILDS CHRISTMAS GIFT!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: JUNK JUNK JUNK! Avoid this item!
Reviews.Author: kmiles
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our 9 yr old daughter for Christmas and were very disappointed.  The second you add maybe two apps to the thing, it completely freezes, crashes or simply turns off.  DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM.  If you are looking for a tablet for a kid, you're better off spending a bit more for something that actually functions, or even a Nintendo DS (they can play games and watch netflix/youtube on that too!).  I should have figured that it would be junk based on the price, but the fact that they're still trying to charge even this much is a joke.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: iginah
Reviews.Content: My two girls (9 and 7 yrs old) love their tablet. They do their basics. Go online to play games and thats pretty much it. I wouldn't recommend it for an adult. It has sort of a lag and the screen resolution isnt the best. But overall we like it!

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy!
Reviews.Author: Dell L Rice
Reviews.Content: This thing only lasted a week. We had to go to a local store and have it replaced with another one which means we spent more money. The battery did not hold a charge.

Reviews.Title: Amazing... until it stopped working!
Reviews.Author: Owen Tucker-Smith
Reviews.Content: I purchased Zeepad because I didn't want to spend too much money on my first tablet. It came in a box, and when I turned it on, It looked great. It had all these applications, and in a few seconds I had temple run. I was bringing it up the stairs. At the top when Iset it down from a few inches of the ground, instead of just landing clean like most tablets, the screen broke offpretty soon I put it back together. Right when I did, the battery ran out. Really short battery! When I recharged it, I seeked it again and pressed the power button, it went to a lock screen, but I couldn't unlock t! It didn't ask me for a password, or anything like that. It just stayed on that lock screen. Thats when the power went out for good. So it was a wonderful tablet. But it breaks and stops working so quickly after you buy. Great 1 week tablet, but terrible structure!

Reviews.Title: Same as my other one. Its a replacement fomy previous warranted item
Reviews.Author: Tia Char
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd replacement Zeepad now. Since I sent for this one I have had 2 more fritz out on me within a couple days of each other so I am not too impressed with them anymore.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: Was nice for my grandchild but technology moves at such great speeds it did not get much use. I will save it for my visitors that get bored with their children.

Reviews.Title: Pathetic
Reviews.Author: Kazim
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this s***ty product. Waste of money. It doesn't even turn on. When it does it keeps hanging. I wish I could 0 star.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Ariana
Reviews.Content: Every program chashes... total disappointmemt ... didmt work from the sstart nothing wromg on my end just never worked properly

Reviews.Title: Horrible quality!
Reviews.Author: TheKewlOne17
Reviews.Content: My grandma has this tablet. The battery life is HORRIBLE!!! I unplugged it from the charger and battery was fully charged. After 30 seconds, the battery ran down to 92% already! The sound is terrible but the headphone jack sounds good. This is so slow it took 4 minutes to boot up the android OS! And the touchscreen doesn't respond half the time due to how slow this tablet is. And the Wi-Fi doesn't even work! The camera is terrible. It looks like a camera from the 1950 except in color. Zeepad sucks! Not again!

Reviews.Title: GREAT LITTLE TABLET
Reviews.Author: Best GrandEver
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband to "play with" over a year ago and it is still going strong.  He reads news, emails, etc. and plays some games on this little tablet, and it is still going great.  I would recommend it for someone who does not do a lot of downloading, fast paced game playing, etc.

Reviews.Title: drena webb
Reviews.Author: drena webb
Reviews.Content: she loves it she uses it for everything she shares and teaches the smaller kids how to use it for when they get theirs

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Carl Traister
Reviews.Content: It is a great tablet that runs everything we have thrown at it so far. It arrived a day before it was supposed to.

Reviews.Title: GET A WARRANTY OF YOU'RE GOING TO GET THIS
Reviews.Author: super5000ify1
Reviews.Content: Ok, this worked for about 2 months before it broke. I didn't even drop it. The thing just stopped working. What can I expect from an $80 tablet? Anyway, luckily I had a warranty because they refunded it fast and it was easy. (Although I would recommend just not buying this at all.)

Reviews.Title: Spend the extra money and get a good tablet.
Reviews.Author: megan
Reviews.Content: I purchased three for my kids... none of them work. I wish I would have returned them right away. They don't hold a charge, they glitch, they are awful... :(

Reviews.Title: Pink Fun
Reviews.Author: Bkharris
Reviews.Content: Not I got this for my 10 yr old for Christmas and its only been a few mos and it no longer charges! Don't waste your money! I want a refund!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Erika Coker
Reviews.Content: I found this product when shopping on Amazon. I wanted to purchase a pad for my granddaughter to watch you tube or play games. She is two. While the product itself is nice looking and works fine, but it is very slow. When it turns on or uploads videos and/or games it does not meet the needs of a 2 year old wanting to watch a video...she want's to watch it now. When I use it for things, I realize it is going to be slow and can work with it.Giving it a rating of 3 isn't necessary a negative thing...it is a good product for the price point!

Reviews.Title: Zeerrad Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Carolyn A. Williams
Reviews.Content: It is no good, not worth the money. I got this tablet as a gift for my granddaughter. It did not work but 2months and froze up.

Reviews.Title: IT'S "OK" BASIC SMALL TABLET.
Reviews.Author: Toots
Reviews.Content: All the specs  on this tablet were great and priced reasonably.  I had to return because the tablet would overheat and start acting up.  Probably good tablet for someone who is not a real heavy user.  Did luv the color choices.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this.
Reviews.Author: Dave C.
Reviews.Content: Bought 4 of these.. one DOA, one died a week later and one died after being knocked out of a kid's hand... you really cannot even exchange them, because they are Chinese POS.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: This tablet has issues with connecting to wifi.  I did research about this specific problem, unfortunately after I received it, and it there is a long list of complaints about this problem.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this item
Reviews.Author: Heather W
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this tablet, it was a good price, for my 4 year old.  We had this for her Christmas present. Today it stopped working completely. I couldn't turn it on, and when I finally did lines, and nothing more. It just won't work. A real waste of money for 65.00. If you want something that will last, spend a little more and make sure it's not a Zeepad. The only warranty is pretty limited to so many days bought. However I would still not buy this again. Its rediculous that it only lasted 3 months. IT's in perfect conditon screen protector, and taken excellant care. I'm really dissapointed with this product.

Reviews.Title: okay
Reviews.Author: Helen Gimson "collector of many"
Reviews.Content: this could be better its slow loading and battery lasts very short time so if you can get a better one

Reviews.Title: was fine until the item on/off switch broke
Reviews.Author: R. J. FOYT
Reviews.Content: This tablet is a decent tablet for our 4 year old. Until the on/off switch broke completely off rendering the tablet nonoperational.  They were quick to refund the cost of tablet however.

Reviews.Title: Save your time and money
Reviews.Author: Emily P. "Novel Seduction"
Reviews.Content: My daughter got one for a Christmas gift. The very first night, the adapter that came with it, broke. Then charging with a usb cord only worked sometimes. If we DID get it to fully charge, it died in about 15 minutes. Downloads were SLOW. To the point that it wasn't worth downloading anything.I would save your money and get something like a Kindle Fire instead. You can get a refurbished Gen 1 for not much more.

Reviews.Title: Great digital photo frame, not very good tablet
Reviews.Author: R. Power
Reviews.Content: First, three cheers for using standard Android and not re-skinning it.  That it runs the standard Google Play Store and standard apps is wonderful.  But aside from the software, the hardware is about as minimal as possible to still run Android 4.2.  I got one of these for my parents and one for us, with the sole intent of making them both digital photo frames.  It's great for that purpose, but I wouldn't suggest it as a regular tablet.  We also have a Kindle Fire HDX that's about the same size but twice the price, and the Kindle is still the better bang for the buck tablet-wise.  This Zeepad tablet has a terrible viewing angle if you try to use it in portrait mode.  But if you want a pretty cool and inexpensive digital photo frame, this is a good option.  I run the Dayframe app and replaced the standard charger with http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001EJHH20/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_15 and http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00A9PO5AM/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_27 and have it sitting horizontally (landscape) in an AmazonBasics stand http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B006ZT4VA0/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_29 at about eye level when sitting.  It beats any other digital photo frame I've found for less than four or five times the price.

Reviews.Title: cheap and not well made
Reviews.Author: Melissa @ just one opinion "mel"
Reviews.Content: I wrote this post months ago for my blog after buying the zeepad I'm not the type of person to just blast a company but I am so sad, frustrated and had my limit with the Android Zeepad 7.0 Tablet PC. My kids have had these tablets a week one of the chargers is broken (yes already) The tablet freezes if it works at all, the volume is bad I can't even explain to you... Nothing works! So I go to the manual which is a joke to call it that... as only one of the Zee-pads came with the "manual" which is written in broken English to the point it's hard to even comprehend what there trying to say. The tablet is a cheaply made Chinese product missing its correct accessories.. And so I contact the "seller" to finally get a reply after chasing butt for days. Oh they will take it back but I have to pay for shipping, I can't get a refund but an exchange after fees and only if they deem no damage was inflicted on the tablet...At this point I can't even cope with this, the tablets are horrible! My kids are in tears and I have no answers for them. I refuse to waste any more money on these things after the $153 to buy them.. I try and refund with Amazon but see here is the catch they were opened ( yes well hello how was I meant to know they where broken) and Amazon only fulfilled shipment so of course I'm stuck with the seller who has no number for me to call. USA wholesale you suck what kind of company doesn't even have a contact number? I can't tell you how bad I feel for my children.. Money does not grow on trees it's not like I can just replace these. I advice anybody considering a tablet for your kids to stay clear of these... iPad, kindle, Nook etc is the way to go... You get what you pay for when it comes to technology :(Since ive posted this review I have had 19 people comment the same thing  happened to them and thousands of page views

Reviews.Title: Broken after 7 months
Reviews.Author: Pat Pim
Reviews.Content: Have been trying to get an RMA # for this and am getting the royal run-around.After this treatment, I would not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: DONT GET IT
Reviews.Author: Kayla Sigmon
Reviews.Content: I had it a year I got it for my 17th birthday present from my mom I loved it at first but now its broken it lasted almost till my 18th birthday, it sucks now I don't have a tablet anymore..

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Rory Cockerline
Reviews.Content: I thought this would be a good tablet to buy for my daughter. I was wrong the tablet fell apart the first time she dropped it. The seller says it is great for kids, but I will agree to disagree on that statement. Besides the tablet not being durable what so ever it is very slow and I am constantly having to go into settings and fix things for her. About a month ago I gave her my old nook and she has not had a single problem that she has had with the Zeepad. My advice spend a few extra bucks on a better tablet or go buy one of the thousands of quality used ones you can find online.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Kathy M.
Reviews.Content: This worked well for my 7 year old granddaughter. She has enjoyed playing games on it. I would recommend it

Reviews.Title: Review for Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: ERIC O.
Reviews.Content: The device performs more functions than anticipated. However, the speed leaves much to be desired. The battery also runs down too quickly.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Kiril Dimoski
Reviews.Content: i got product on time and it is as described ... i still have it and i am very pleased how it works ...if u have need of tablet this is the one

Reviews.Title: Already Broken : (
Reviews.Author: Lizzie
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son for Christmas, and it is already completely broken.  We just missed the cut-off for return, which was January 31st.  I would not recommend this product.  When we try to turn it on, lines come across the screen.

Reviews.Title: cheaply made
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: VERY cheaply made. Buttons felt like they were going to fall right off. Nice and light and slim but returned because I didn't think it would last a week...

Reviews.Title: Nice Tablet
Reviews.Author: Kristen M Bass
Reviews.Content: I have two of these. They work great! I have had one over a year, it's been dropped and used by 3 different kids of all ages and still works great. So I got my oldest son one and he loves it! Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Buyer BEWARE! Junk!
Reviews.Author: Alisa Dickson
Reviews.Content: First, to clarify, I did not purchase this item from Amazon. But my review is for this model of Zeepad. I am so disappointed and frustrated with this purchase that I wanted to submit a review to save others the time, hassle and money. The first problem occurred when I attempted to read the user manual before doing anything with the tablet. It was horrific! The manual was written with english words but the grammatical errors, spelling errors and everything else about it was so poor that I couldn't make sense of it. It was like reading a different language with english words. Once I let it charge for the day I gave it a try, only to be completely disappointed! I realize I didn't purchase an iPad so I was willing to give it a chance. I tried to play a netflix from it only to find that I could hardly make out the image on the  screen. I also had to hold the tablet at one exact angle in order to even see anything. The sound was so poor I couldn't tell anything was even coming out of the speaker until I turned it over and held it right up to my ear. (That was after I had turned up all of the sound). The final complaint and what lead me to my decision to return it, (as if the above is not enough) is that there is such a delay when pressing an icon that I felt like I had to keep pushing it to make sure it was recognizing my touch. Actually, I can't say there is anything good about this tablet. Buyer beware, Do NOT but this! I don't even want to give it one star. It doesn't deserve it!This is by far the worst item I have ever purchased off the internet.

Reviews.Title: Works great.
Reviews.Author: Dobiedude
Reviews.Content: I am using this as an engine monitor in my truck. Downloaded an app for this. Internet is a bit slow.

Reviews.Title: Grandson's gift
Reviews.Author: fangal
Reviews.Content: I sent this to my grandson.  He loves it! He is able to look up his own videos and play games he likse. We are looking forward to his learning a great deal from it. And he doesn't have to borrow our phones to play!

Reviews.Title: Horrible purchase
Reviews.Author: Ben O.
Reviews.Content: The Zeepad was purchased for my 10 year old nephew for Christmas. It arrived and I could tell from the beginning that we were going to have trouble. The earphones would not fit into the Zeepad. We chose to keep it anyway at that point. Within 5 days, we started having trouble logging on and staying logged into wifi. A week later, we could not even get the thing to turn on. It was fully charged and would not turn on while plugged in or not plugged in. Needless to say, my nephew was disappointed and I felt like a complete loser aunt!

Reviews.Title: Didnt work from day one.
Reviews.Author: shadwina
Reviews.Content: I would rate a zero if I could, it did not work from day one, I charged it per the directions and it came on but cut right off, I tried to turn it on again by holding the button for two minutes as directed, it came on but went off again within a few minutes, I got this for my daughter as a christmas present and had to send it back. I read the reviews and seen this was a problem for other buyers, I did buy a blue one for my other daughter and that one is working, but for the problem with the pink one I wouldn't suggest anyone buying one.

Reviews.Title: Really Fast and a must have for fisrst timers
Reviews.Author: Chalie Ann Davis
Reviews.Content: Got this yesterday. I really like it. I bought it for someone and he asked me to put the games and stuff on it. I have a Motorola Atrix 2 so I know that dual core and A8 cortex means something good lol because my phone runs fast and nice. Any way I really like this tablet the dispalay is nice! The camera has flash (I was surprised at that) and there is a front and rear facing camera. I know its only 4gigs so that doesnt matter all you need is a mini sd.I have to order one of these for my self just to have being that they are only $63....when i was loading the games the tablet did reset and stay on the welcome screen but after I pluged in the charged it continued to load. I hope this isnt a problem that he will encounter alot.But none the less I will be purchasing another! Maybe a pink one becuase even though my husband has his own 10" tab he likes new stuff! -____- Now that im thinking about it my 6 and 5 year old girls having a pink tablet might draw there attention o.0

Reviews.Title: Busted!
Reviews.Author: A User
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these and all three broke very quickly.  The power buttons break and are hard to get to make a connection inside.  One started showing the script that runs in the background on the screen in the foreground and the others screen cracked far too easily.  You get what you pay for I guess.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Kerri
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son and within a month it was not working right.  I wasn't able to understand the instruction guide very well when trying to fix it.  Resetting it just seemed to make things worse.

Reviews.Title: Summary
Reviews.Author: Patricia Hilliard
Reviews.Content: For the price, very good. Purchased for a 7 yr old and a 3 yr old, both use it quite well for games. Have tried it myself and prefer it over FB for one particular game,

Reviews.Title: CHEAP QUALITY DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: April Epps
Reviews.Content: The quality cheap brought for a gift a month ago my niece jes got in town to use it the charger do not charge the thing & was using USB charger 2 times now the thing wont charge at all and since we jes discovered cus it was a gift now I'm stick with crap & my 6 yr. Old niece which was excited about her gift is now sad.........

Reviews.Title: great for the money!!
Reviews.Author: chrisha emmanuel
Reviews.Content: i fine it worth it. oh GOD !! i have no tips leave meh alone. i gone laterz. stop it now eh!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work anymore
Reviews.Author: nichole sibu
Reviews.Content: This device quit working after about 3 weeks. Screen is now blue and does not function. Very disappointing. Also, for me, the screen resolution, when it did work, made me dizzy. Although I didn't expect high quality for the price.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: A. Cherry
Reviews.Content: This tablet works exactly as you would expect for the price.  Applications run a bit slow and the battery life is very poor.  Great starter tablet for a tween.

Reviews.Title: Great my children loved it and the colors were amazing! Thanks will shop again.
Reviews.Author: Kristin S.
Reviews.Content: This Tablet is a show stopper, its choice in colors help my children determine which one is theirs. It came with the Angry birds already downloaded and the shipping was extremely fast. Sleek looking and excellent quality. Just what we needed! Thanks

Reviews.Title: Tablet is a headache
Reviews.Author: jonathan orsini
Reviews.Content: I've had numerous problems with the tablet since I opened it from the package.the charger port doesn't work anymore it keeps shutting off by it self and erases the entire tablet back to its original state

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: JH
Reviews.Content: Bought this zeepad 7" tablet for my 7 yr. old granddaughter for Christmas.  I played with it and downloaded some free games and bought some music (it does come with 2 or 3 games already on it which is good).  Then I charged it up so it would be ready to go when she opened it.  She absolutely loved it.  I did find a place to set the security also.  It worked great with our wifi and does internet searches quickly.  I think it is just as good or better than the more expensive tablets.  I love that it came with a USB cable to connect to a computer and also earphones and a stylus pen.  It also plays the music purchased from iTunes that I transferred to it and my other granddaughter's more expensive kindle will not.  If you give it as a gift and you enter your google account to download anything just remember to delete the account before you give it since it downloads your emails in the gmail.  I did have a hard time finding how to delete my google account from the tablet but once I did, it deleted the 300 emails it had downloaded.  Oh and it arrived much quicker than expected.  I think this was a great purchase for the money and would like to get one for myself.

Reviews.Title: within the year it stopped working
Reviews.Author: Paige C.
Reviews.Content: We have had it less then a year and the internal battery died. This is not the battery that you can replace or charge. Waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Starter Pad
Reviews.Author: Susan Wolff
Reviews.Content: This is a great value for a first pad. Works great and it has room to grow with you. And I love the color. Its so bright and cheerful.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Ham
Reviews.Content: The 9 year old that it was given to for a birthday gift loves it n does what she needs it to.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply produced
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift...powered it on once...worked fine.  Now it will not power one any more.I do not recommend purchasing this item as you will only be contacting Amazon shortly after you receive it for a refund.

Reviews.Title: best gift award
Reviews.Author: ksolt
Reviews.Content: Great price. works well. bought 2 for christmas gifts for my grandchildren (ages 4 and 7). they have not put them down. We got the "best" gift award from them both. would suggest getting protective case.

Reviews.Title: Good buy for the money
Reviews.Author: Ash
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 9  year old daughter as a  Christmas present.  It's a  great deal for the money and perfect for her.  We haven't had any problems so far and she loves it.  It seems nicely made and fairly sturdy so I feel like it will hold up well.

Reviews.Title: Affordable price for two weeks use
Reviews.Author: Melissa F.
Reviews.Content: Don't let the affordable price fool you into buying this product. Childrens games and Netflix are the only apps used and it freezes. Two weeks of problem free use, only trouble shooting help in the "owner's manual" says make sure it's fully charged. We have resorted to only using it while plugged in and that hasn't changed the freezing. Do not buy this product, spend more on a tablet and get something reliable.

Reviews.Title: good for target shooting
Reviews.Author: shaun
Reviews.Content: Junk would never charge an screen was horrible , pissed me off so loaded my 357 with new rounds got for Christmas an you can figure out the rest ..garbage

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought 2 Zeepad for our daugthers's Christmas. They are great! More than enough for kids!Many apps like Netflix and Skype are pre-installed, but we had the instal a newer version of Skype to do video call!One thing that could have been better: the cord is quite short! So if you want to use the tablet when charging you have to be pretty close to the outlet!

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: very good lil tab the only thing i dont like about it the battery life sucks.... buy a kindle or samsung if u want longer battery life

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: cassandra
Reviews.Content: bought this item the beginning of this year and we used it for two weeks and for the last year i have been trying to get this piece of junk to work. it keeps saying too many pattern attempts and refuses to let us login. there is no reset button to be found on this tablet and hard reseting it is impossible. so im stuck with a junk tablet and a waste of money!!!!! finding a site for the seller or product is hard and cant get any help to see what to do to try and fix it. i would recommend staying away from this brand of tablet. if you search the internet you will see where so many people are in the same boat as me with the same problem!!

Reviews.Title: Failure out of box
Reviews.Author: Jasbir Sidhu
Reviews.Content: I bought Zeepad online and failed out of box. The device was not able to get beyond initial screen and not able to unlock the device. I would recommend anybody to purchase this device

Reviews.Title: nice!!
Reviews.Author: mary_clyne
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my grand daughter and it seemed to be working OK for now. will give a better review after i see if continues working.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy it!
Reviews.Author: lace
Reviews.Content: My daughter's father bought this tablet. We followed the instruction's and let it charge for the whole 5-6 hrs. Poor battery life, screen freezes up and then the display went out. I ordered the tablet on amazon which I do not shop any more. When we tried to return it there were lots of problems. Amazon said to contact the seller the seller said contact the manufacture, so we contact the manufacturer of the tablet. They give him a address to send it to along with a money order request to fix the tablet. He sends the money order and the tablet the same week he spoke to them via phone. Two weeks later when he calls he talks to random people at the company. They tell him they have the tablet but did not have the money order. To make a long story short. He was out of a tablet and the money he spent on the tablet also the money order for the repair. Too much trouble for a cheap ass tablet.

Reviews.Title: Android
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: I really liked it - but I dropped it and had to buy a new one.  I thought maybe there would be some kind of an insurance for replacement - but since it was my fault - I would guess not.

Reviews.Title: gift for my son
Reviews.Author: charity
Reviews.Content: He really loves it. He takes it everywhere we go. It also seems very sturdy. Not very thin like other tablets. It also came with ear buds a stylus and data cable and extra screen protector.

Reviews.Title: I am happy
Reviews.Author: J. Ford
Reviews.Content: I was a little concerned about ordering since this was a Christmas present for my great grandson aged 4.  I was afraid it wouldn't arrive on time for his visit with me.  The tablet arrived on the day promised and was a wonderful gift.  (I had time to set it up so he could begin enjoying it as soon as he received it).  I would recommend this seller and won't hesitate to use them in the future.

Reviews.Title: touch pad
Reviews.Author: Richard Eagleston
Reviews.Content: This was an inexpensive way to get my granddaughter introduced to a touch pad. It works perfectly and does everything an introductory pad should.

Reviews.Title: First review below...NEW REVIEW...AWFUL
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was my original review below...I am going to let you all know that these tablets are JUNK!!!! Both stopped charging after two months...one of the chargers literally SHREDDED exposing all the wires. The power button would stick on both tablets, not allowing you to turn on or off. Thank goodness I always purchase the SQUARETRADE warranty because I would be out of money!! I called SQUARETRADE to see about coverage.... this product would have normally been covered under the manufacturer given the timeframe, BUT since this is made in China and it's based out of there...they were nice enough to let me return the product to them, get my amazon gift cards and be done with these ZEEPADS!!!! Now on to finding a better quality tablet for my girls!!!We purchased two tablets for our 4 & 5 y/o girls. They play on my android phone and ipods continuously. These tablets are PERFECT for the game play and NETFLIX that they enjoy on a regular basis. I am very pleased so far with the quality for the price. I plan on purchasing one for myself in the coming weeks

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Terrie Phoenix
Reviews.Content: It was a Chrismas gift for some children. They are so happy, they're sleeping with the tablets. Now I need to purchase one. They won't share with me.

Reviews.Title: peice of crap
Reviews.Author: glc
Reviews.Content: bought it as a gift for my niece's birthday. got 'stuck' in shipping and came a MONTH AFTER her birthday. then froze up and stopped working two months later!never again.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: karen
Reviews.Content: this one tablet was great. everything worked and my daughter loved it. thank you it was a great gift thanks again

Reviews.Title: Defective/Damaged Upon Opening
Reviews.Author: Madison
Reviews.Content: Was bought for a Christmas gift, and was malfunctioning immediately upon first use, and then just got worse. The screen is malfunctioning to the point it will not acknowledge when you click on something, and scrolls violently even when you are not touching the screen. Would not buy from this seller again. EVER. Bought the 7" inch Dual-Camera version, and will definitely be looking to return it.

Reviews.Title: my daughter loves her Zeepad!!
Reviews.Author: Dawn
Reviews.Content: it has netflix and snapchat...the only thing she can't get is SubWay Surfers but other than that she loves it!

Reviews.Title: A GREAT BUY AND GOOD GIFT!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Y.
Reviews.Content: Purchase 4 of these as Christmas gifts.  My Grandchildren loved them.  We charged them prior to giving them out, and once the wrapping was undone, the kids did not put them down.  It was as though they were the only gift they received.  These zeepads were the best thing I could have chosen!  They are good for all ages ranging from child to adult.  I'm thinking of purchasing one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Total junk...
Reviews.Author: Online Shopper "onlineshopper"
Reviews.Content: The description says it all.  I bought 2 of these for my granddaughters Christmas in 2012.  They didn't last till February.  Don't waste your money.  They are crap!!!

Reviews.Title: Crapola...
Reviews.Author: JK Honeycutt
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 zeepads. At first everything seemed great until I noticed the micro USB port was missing from 1 tablet. In its place was an empty hole where the port should've been installed.

Reviews.Title: Didn't last at all
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately we bought this for our 4 year old daughter to play games on and didn't want to invest a lot of money; however it only worked for about 6 months.  It was nice while it lasted but now it won't hold a charge.  Even with a new charger, it barely powers on while plugged in.  Won't turn on at all without being plugged in.

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Taramatee Cindy Bhukal
Reviews.Content: I bought this item from Amazon and it arrived today.  I checked it and the camera is not working properly.  It comes on but you cannot get to take a photo.  The video icon is also sticking.  This part of the tablet is sticking and i'm wondering what it is really working.  It is slow. I am not pleased with this.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my grandsons.  The produce allows them the game experience as well as watching T.V.  It is easy to use and great in the car.

Reviews.Title: Spend a little more and get a good tablet
Reviews.Author: ESTEBAN MORENO
Reviews.Content: The display broke after a few days. I don't know why. The battery didn't  last very long, like two hours.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price, recommended.
Reviews.Author: Gregory Lunar
Reviews.Content: The price appeared to me excellent, although it is not a recognized brand of tablet but is very well built, has been charged with good applications and games and dferencia other also brings the playstore and good accessories. It was received in perfect condition thanks to that it was well packaged.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: evelyn
Reviews.Content: what an awesome tablet for the money.  Does more than I expected. GREAT BUY FOR THE KIDS OR TEENAGERS OR GRAMMA.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: valerie armstrong
Reviews.Content: Great little tablet so far no complaints. Runs fast hasn't locked up once. Good quality product. Cameras take decent pics.

Reviews.Title: Cheap tablet....break easy....not worth the time and money
Reviews.Author: Alireza Torabi
Reviews.Content: I looked a relatively descent tablet...I bought it for my niece and mail it. However, the screen and monitor become blurry after 2-3 weeks....thought to return it and get a new one...but not worth the time...quality is poor...better to get a more expensive that last

Reviews.Title: Disappointed -
Reviews.Author: satisfied customer
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed with this tablet. Purchased for my little computer genius, only to have it freeze, not take a charge, and just completely give up and die. The screen was never clear. Locating warranty information was useless.

Reviews.Title: The best investment that I have made for my grandson who just turned 2 on Nov 1st.
Reviews.Author: Gail Forsythe
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandson who  just turned 2 on Nov 1st. I had already taught him his numbers 0 - 9, basic colors, 7 shapes, and 30 sign languages. I was trying to figure out how to teach him the alphabet. One day we had the magnetic letters and he told me 7 of the letters correctly. He now knows about 1/2 of the alphabet and it's from an APP that I downloaded on his tablet. He had several educational apps on it, including flashcards. He is learning different vegetables, body parts, instruments, animals, along with other information that a child of the age of 2, usually does not learn. The only problem is, the battery runs down too fast. It is though, very well built for even a 2 year old, although he is monitored with it and does not just carry it around without supervision.

Reviews.Title: Good buy.
Reviews.Author: P. Manley "book lover"
Reviews.Content: I would give this a five but the sound is very weak.  I got this for my toddler grand daughter so she would leave my galaxy tablet alone.  It was cheaper than the kids tablets and works just as well.  She still prefers mine tablet when watching videos because the sound on this one is so weak but other than that, we love it.  And since we have had it a few months and it's being used my a 2 1/2 year old--I would have to say it is sturdy.

Reviews.Title: crap
Reviews.Author: Fanny Torres
Reviews.Content: Broke after only 1 week of use, the battery would die after only 1 hour of use. Terrible product. Unhappy

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this one.
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: Came with JellyBean 4.1.1 installed, and unlike previous versions it has no root access. Battery life started out at 2 hours, but since some new batteries improve after a few cycles, I figured I'd give it a chance. 3 days later it won't last 1.5 hours before the low battery warning. Screen is inconsistent, sometimes it's extremely sensitive, and sometimes it just won't register, even with the included pointer.

Reviews.Title: Work fine but having some problems.
Reviews.Author: travis
Reviews.Content: Well it has been working fine,but charging it becomes the problem where the cord plugs in it,you have to hold it or prop it up so it will take a full charge.

Reviews.Title: Will NEVER buy another Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Butterflykisses1781
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd Zeepad and each of them has had a unique issue.  The manufacturer doesn't even have a phone number you can contact for support and there is no one that will service these devices.  This on in particular stopped charging with the provided charging cord 2 days after we got it.  Thank God I purchased a Square Trade Warranty on it so I could get credit to buy a Kindle for my daughter instead.

Reviews.Title: Loved this tablet until it would not charge
Reviews.Author: Erika
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's 7th birthday and he loved it. Now it's three months later it will not charge nor come on.

Reviews.Title: Three and a half
Reviews.Author: valerie mclean
Reviews.Content: It did not have skype on it nor did it have any pre loaded games but over all not to bad. I give it 3.5 stars

Reviews.Title: Great android
Reviews.Author: Eva Simon
Reviews.Content: This tablet really surprised me, its great i don't feel the need to bring my laptop everywhere with me because it practically does all what the laptop can do. However the one problem with the zeepad is that it can't handle too much pressure otherwise it just freezes and then you would have to restart it and the camera well mine worked for like about a month and then it just stopped working really don't know why to this day. But still i would recommend it for adults, kids, grandparents it fun and easy to use too

Reviews.Title: Great Product for a Great Price!!!!
Reviews.Author: Erin Storey`
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sons birthday present, we wanted a tablet for him that wasn't crazy expensive but he could play games and read books, and even go onto facebook.  It is the perfect size and works great!!  The only problem I had was once trying to connect to the internet. I fixed the time zone and it connected right away. It is set up just like my Galaxay Tablet so the set up for us was real easy. Great product for a Great price!!

Reviews.Title: It's alright, few serious things though.
Reviews.Author: Michael Riddle
Reviews.Content: My tablet came with Jelly Bean 4.1.1 NOT ICS 4.0.4, and was NOT rooted. Luckily there's a program called Uberizer that can root 4.1.1 for any A13 device. The downside right now is there is a 4.2.2 update, but it's not rooting right...Overall, if you're just looking for a simple tablet for a kid to play with or something it's not to bad -- I plan to use it for my car's touchscreen/computer and am going to have to do a lot of tinkering to get it working how I was hoping.

Reviews.Title: Not the best tablet
Reviews.Author: GrammaBarbara
Reviews.Content: I am a bit disappointed with this tablet.  It is slow coming on.  The manual gives very little info and in poor English.  It is not as easy to use as I hoped it would be.  I should have read the reviews on this before investing in it.

Reviews.Title: bought for a gift
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: my bf bought this for a gift for his little teen cousin. it was just ok for us because when we got it we tried it out and it was slow but great for a child or teen. she seem to enjoy it when she got her gift.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I ordered.
Reviews.Author: adam minnicks
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these for my kids' birthdays and the company said they were used but in good condition. They were brand new with nothing touched. They work perfectly for my kids aged 6 and 9. They can play their little games and go on youtube like they were doing with mommy's kindle. Now they don't have to use mommy's or fight over just having one tablet. Wifi works great, and the company sent them right on time. I'm very happy as usual with amazon. I always find a great deal on here.

Reviews.Title: Great for my 8 year old!
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: This is perfect for my daughter's 1st tablet! It came loaded with some of her favorite games and its super fast for her to download new ones.  It turned right on and connected to our wifi with no problems.

Reviews.Title: It works - Kinda
Reviews.Author: ariona_lie
Reviews.Content: Well where do I start with this thing. I read the review, but they were pretty mixed so I decided to try it myself. Now, when we first got it, we let it charge ALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL Night (xmas eve) My daughter was so excited, but - well it wouldnt turn on... FINALLY after another day of charging it turned on. My daughter who was 9 at the time started downloading apps - Youtube, Sugar Crush, Instagram, Angry Birds.... welllll......................skype didnt work too well, You cant see the whole game of sugarcrush - but Pandora and Youtube work just great (as long as its charged) I would next time keep my money and get a better name brand - but I guess now my 3 year old can have it...

Reviews.Title: THIS IS JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR!! AMAZING

Reviews.Title: Really nice for the price!
Reviews.Author: E. Scinta
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 10yr old daughter because she wanted a tablet of her own. I didn't want to spend a lot of money in case she broke it or didn't take care of it, so after looking on here and reading all the reviews I bought her this one. I gotta say I was really surprised with this because I was expecting it to be on the lower quality side because of the price. But it's actually really nice. Have a lot of pros and some cons for this tablet:Pros:-Very heavy duty but still light weight which I like. Seems like it'll last longer and it doesn't seem like it'll break easy if dropped.-Came with a bunch of stuff including charger, stylus, headphones and 2 USB chords-Very easy to set up WiFi and all the time/location settings.-Going between screens, closing out programs and personalizing tablet is super easy to do.-WiFi connectivity is great and have had no problems connecting to the house router and actually picked up a ton of other routers in the area too when it was searching for connections.-Touch screen works great. Using the stylus works even better.-All apps seem to work well - liked how there were a lot already installed like YouTube and Angry Birds.-Big pro for me was that you can turn this tablet off and on to save battery life. And it doesn't just go into "sleep mode" like the ipad, it actually turns off which is very nice.-Like how there's a slot for the SD card to add more storage to device.-Camera seems to work great. Can take pictures or record video and switch between the dual cameras. (Resolution is meh though - see below in 'Cons')-Charging is actually really quick. Takes maybe an hour or so to get the battery up to 100% once it's down to nothing.-Gets all the same apps as the iPad using the Google Play store (pretty much it's just like an Android phone but bigger and you can't make phone calls)Cons:-Will lag if you have too many programs open at the same time (which makes sense as the memory isn't that high).-Speakers aren't all that great. I think that's why they included the headphones because the highest volume is still kind of hard to hear sometimes depending on what you're listening too.-Resolution is alright. Not as good as the ipad or Windows tablet though. But it's not horrible, just not HD or anything.I'd definitely recommend this for a kid that wants a tablet. So far my daughter LOVES this and hasn't put it down since we gave it to her.

Reviews.Title: Lasted 6 months with light use and no abuse...
Reviews.Author: Cevyn L. Miles-monaghan
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet for my wife to play casual games on.  For that purpose, and considering the low price, it works great.  Mine came with Jelly Bean pre-installed.  The box even says "Jelly Bean" on it.  The About screen in the OS confirms this as well.  Unlike other ZeePads with Android ICS, this updated model was NOT rooted out of the box.The first thing I did to prep this for her was to root it using "Root with Restore by Bin4ry", from the XDA forums, and then installed Ad-Away and Root Cleaner.  I also uninstalled the apps and games she doesn't use to free up some memory - root not required.Battery life is so-so.  A couple hours of gaming will kill it, but it lasts a decent amount of time for other tasks.  The back of the tablet does get quite warm while gaming.  Performance is decent, however a task killing app is useful for freeing up some memory.  The screen is OK as well and responds to touch accurately.  The viewing angle is quite limited compared to a high end IPS display, though the update speed is plenty fast for her games and doesn't exhibit motion blur.I didn't find any Chinese spamware on this tablet as I did on the Star N9500 phone that I purchased and reviewed here on Amazon.UPDATE 02-20-2014: The tablet has degraded substantially with light use.  Random lockups, reboots, green lines on the screen and other anomalies make it pretty much unusable.  I even flashed the latest stock firmware, and without any additional apps installed the same problems are present, indicating hardware failure.

Reviews.Title: Mixed feelings
Reviews.Author: Wayfinder
Reviews.Content: I hate writing this kind of review, because I don't know whether to review the product or the advertising/shipping.  So, giving it 3 stars as a "belated thumbs up".THE PRODUCT.  The Zeepad itself is fairly awesome.  It's decently fast.  Decently responsive.  I like the way Android is set up on it-- not a bunch of extra brand-specific garbage.  Easy to use.  Speaker is acceptably loud.  No bluetooth but that's as advertised.  Love the multi-function USB port.  Love that it charges either from the charger port or USB.  For the price, this is an impressive little tablet.  Didn't like the 800x400 screen pixels... too few really.  But it works and aside from typical "short freeze" lag factors common in Android devices, this is a great little system at $70.  The device itself I give a solid 4+ stars.THE SHIPPING and ADVERTISING.  Not so spiffy.  The ad seems to change from time to time and what was originally listed as "up to 1200 x 600 graphics resolution" turned out to be significantly less.  In truth, 800x400 just doesn't quite cut it.  It limits the number of icons one can have on one screen.  Now if that had been advertised would be fine.  Noticed at times the screen says just that.  But at other times it advertises the 1200 x 600 and (while I don't know why), that's going to cause problem expectations.But the real problem I had (and what knocked this down to 3 stars), when purchased from "WorryFree Gadgets"... it came shipped in its own box loose-packed inside an Amazon box-- no padding to keep it from bumping around.  Meh, these packages take quite a bit of bumping anyway, so not too worried.  But... Amazon box was in fine shape while the Zeepad box was significantly crushed.  Since the outer box was fine, that means it was PACKED in that condition.  As a result while the Zeepad itself seemed okay, the screen protector packed as a "bonus item" in the top of the box was also crushed.  Not happy with that.The bonuses were nice.  The Zeepad stylus, the screen protector (if it hadn't been damaged *at the time of shipping*), the mini-usb adapter, everything was fine.  But I don't have much tolerance for a merchant taking a visibly and significantly damaged box and going ahead and shipping it without even inspecting the contents.  That's lazy and it's just not right.So... three stars.  Like other users I give the Zeepad itself a thumbs-up value-for-the-buck rating.  For the shipping and merchant care, not so much.  The question I have:  was it shipped directly from the merchant or from Amazon itself?  The screen said "Sold by Goodios and Fulfilled by Amazon."  So which is it... Worry-Free Gadgets, Goodios or Amazon to blame for shoddy packing?  Who crushed the inner box and who sent it out in that condition?  Dunno.  It got it returned though, and Amazon was great about that as always... with a refund to my account in less than 24 hours and free UPS pickup (just cannot beat Amazon on customer service).This is a product that cannot be exchanged, only returned.  That's fine because in truth, I want a bit better resolution screen if available-- and the new Zeepads are just now hitting the market with DOUBLE THE MEMORY for about $10 more (nice coincidence there).Despite the problems I still <3 Amazon, and the Zeepad is everything everyone raves about.  For a starter Android tablet or one for kids... this is a good choice.

Reviews.Content: Apps loaded well great speed small in size, the only problem i had was that the built in speaker didnt work, I still want the product, just one that works completly.

Reviews.Title: Love it!

It last about 2 hours. But with a USB charger for the car it is great to take on the road.I am wanting to get one for myself. This is a great tablet and the price makes it even better!

Reviews.Content: I have been so proud of my pad. It has really been my company since my surgery. Better than if I had an ipad. Way less expensive with so many features!

Reviews.Title: Good tablet

Reviews.Content: I had to buy a new one becuse my old one fell down the basement stairs the screen didn't crack nothing broke but the power button what I find odd is when I got my new one it came with the USB cord and a good charger but my old one just came with a USB cord that plugs in to a wall charger I only baought the one that broke three months ago before buying a new one with the old one I chould only charge it with a USB cord that connects to a wall charger and the USB port was starting to become worn out so they must have changed it were they send you a good charger and the USB cord separately with the pad I love the new one and its small enough to put in my cargo pants side pocket iam thinking about buying one for my brother seeing how its durable to a limit it whould be great for a kids first tablet I think I'll be more carefull with the new one lol

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY. You WILL regret it.

Reviews.Content: Had the item for a little over 5 months and now it does not work.  I saw the negative reviews but like an idiot, I figured it wouldnt happen to me. Reviews.Title: Two out of Three broke in less than Three Months and NO support
Reviews.Author: Russell E. Holland Jr
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these for my kids for Christmas - seemed like a cheap alternative to see if they would like this type of thing.They worked great at first, but within a week one charger burned out, then another so they were sharing the third charger or using the alternate usb charging.Then 2 of the 3 stopped taking a charge all together.  Terrible construction on this product.And the service was worse - they first offered to sell me 2 new chargers at the same price I could just order them from amazon and then offered to fix the pads IF I paid for the fix because it was past 30 days - shortest warrantee I ever heard of...Do yourself a favor and splurge for the ASUS or Nexus right out of the gate.

Reviews.Title: Awful

Reviews.Content: 5 DAY UPDATE! : I've been trying to return this piece of crap since the second day I received it because the volume is not cooperating with me, but no response from the seller. >:( Getting REALLY frustrated, and I have it just sitting in its box now! I just filed another return request, and if nothing happens again and it surpasses the 14 day policy, I'm FILING A CLAIM!Just received my pink Zeepad today. Really disappointed because the volume SUCKS! I have it at its highest and can barely hear. I bought it in January, now in May it stopped working, the on-off button broke and fell into the tablet. Now i'm having to send it back, and pay for the repair myself. It was great for a while, but I really should have spent the $30 more and bought another one.

I am so mad because I bought accessories for this.  I can return this item, but how will I get those returned..hope they work on another 7inch tablet that will be better than this crap!  ugh!!  :(  I wish I had listened the negative reviews instead of all the stupid positive ones cause this things is pure crap! Reviews.Title: People claim reviews are fake which scared me, but I've given the time after receiving the product and have no complaints!
Reviews.Author: B. Mortinson
Reviews.Content: I ordered quickly after seeing high reviews. There was a delay with it being sent, and after closer overlook of reviews I found some pretty bad ones. I was fearful, so I took a couple weeks to be sure all was well. The product arrived within the time allotted. Weve had no problems with a power button, or battery problem, charging, nothing. It is a great product! Especially for the price!!!! Thanks!***UPDATE almost 6 mo later** A couple months ago the product stopped charging. Ive seen others on here also complaining of problems with the charging port but figured Id figure something out or it was cheap enough to just buy my daughter a higher quality tablet in the future. What I believe to be the problem it on the charger the metal piece is wobbly. Its loose and it makes sense because ive read of others piece getting stuck within the port. Ours hasnt. I hope to get some sort of response or help because were trying to find a charger for it and I have no idea what to do. I understand this product is low cost and it is a quality product for the price but if the chargers arent working and keep being loose we cant use the product. *****

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE
Reviews.Author: Cati Holker
Reviews.Content: Wow, I wish I would have taken the bad reviews on this product more seriously.It took a LONG time for the product to come.  Shipment tracking was poor and non-specific.When I finally received the tablet, I was relieved (I was beginning to think I had been ripped off), and overall, I was happy with the tablet.Not ONE MONTH later, the power button became depressed/lodged and now my tablet is rendered useless. The tablet charges and the screen is active, but I cannot turn it on.  I contacted the company and have received no answer.This company is based in China, so correspondence can be difficult due to the language barrier.  This isn't a deal-breaker on it's own for me, in addition to everything else, it's just a tad bit frustrating.$80 wasted.

Reviews.Title: Mine came defective/damaged can't get through to amazon cs.
Reviews.Author: yeahaboutthat
Reviews.Content: The 2 stars is for this product's performance, not amazon's poor customer service of course. (Just wanted to say that before anyone jumps down my throat) Bought for my mom, who has cancer and lives with me. I handled it mostly to help her set it up and we noticed problems right off the bat. We weren't expecting anything fancy, but to work and be able to get some use out of it would have been appropriate for the price paid I think. We charged it to full first thing, set it up a little bit, turned it off with the charge at 74 percent and turned it back on 30 minutes later to discover the battery had completely drained. To our disappointment, it does that every time. The touch screen is unresponsive at times especially in certain areas, you have to press really hard and sometimes even then it does not respond. There are specks in the back of the lcd screen, enough to be bothersome when using. My mom is too polite to want to return it when I mentioned it she said no, she already threw out the box it came in anyways and said it'll be alright and she feels bad. At first it was extremely slow to charge, taking hours to just get even halfway, and sometimes after it has been charged all the way and she disconnects the charger the full charge goes right back down to only a barely charged within seconds without doing anything. I have been trying to contact amazon's customer service, I remember years ago they had the best customer service if ever there was a problem, now I can't even get ahold of them. I don't have a phone with minutes right now but have been trying to submit their online forms and have been getting a "We're sorry. There was an error trying to send your e-mail. Please try again in a few minutes or contact us by phone." Message. I have been trying several times a day everyday, it doesn't look like they are fixing the form problem. I have scoured the internet for their customer service address but it seems like all of them have been disabled. Extremely disappointed with this product and with amazon's customer service, they lost a long time customer. Again, rating I gave strictly for product performance only, just had to throw in my problems with customer service in this experience to maybe save someone else the trouble.

Reviews.Title: This product is pretty awesome

Reviews.Title: Awesome Zeepad!
Reviews.Author: lynneiggy49
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Zeepad for my grandson and he loves it.  His older brother asked for one for his birthday as well.  It was a hit!

Reviews.Title: very pleased with purchase
Reviews.Author: South Sound Sailor
Reviews.Content: This tablet (the Zeepad 7.0) was a birthday gift for my 10 year old son. He is VERY rough with toys and anything that's electronic. I was hesitant to give him a tablet of any kind but he had shown great interest in using his mom's Kindle Fire (under her watchful eye!), including practicing reading skills, so I decided to go with a budget-priced tablet and get him one of his own. We are now at week 3 with his use of the Zeepad and so far, so good! He uses it daily for Netflix, Angry Birds and reading e-books. I estimate he's put at least 80 hours of use into the tablet and it still functions perfectly.I was VERY pleased with the quality of the video, given the price range. I was expecting Netflix movies to appear blocky and lo-res looking but that's not at all the case. I'm very pleased with the overall performance of this tablet. I've had no problems logging into Google Play and installing new apps. Keep in mind - this tablet is NOT going to set speed records. Yes, there are lag times in contrast to higher priced tablets but we're talking maybe 1 to possibly 5 seconds (Netflix in particular can take several seconds to boot up). But once an app is up and running, we've had no performance problems.One BIG caution. The battery life is very short before recharging is required. He usually just stays plugged in (you can charge and use the device at the same time) to avoid having the tablet shut down during a record-breaking Angry Birds game. I estimate the battery life is 2 to 2.5 hours tops.If you are able to cope with the short battery life, I highly recommend the Zeepad for kids and for anyone who is looking for a low-priced tablet.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Starling
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our 3 year old because she loves to play on our phones. Very easy to use, great product for the price!! I would definitely recommend this!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!
