Reviews.Content: Love it second one iboughtWill buy another just what I order first was hot pink n second one lite pink better to keep up

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Kia
Reviews.Content: Only problem is that I have not found out how to put the parental control on. Bought this for my 9 yr old. She loves it

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: neice
Reviews.Content: I like the product considering the lower price. The pictures and videos show a lil dark. But I like it however I will upgrade in the near future. The shipping took very long which wasn't good considering it was a bit expensive

Reviews.Title: for the money
Reviews.Author: frank
Reviews.Content: lags a little bit when hitting the icons. Other than that good item for the price for the money that I paid.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a 3-4 year old!!!
Reviews.Author: Melissa S. Hartley
Reviews.Content: This tablet is perfect for my almost 4 year old who loves to play my iPad!  If you're going to be using it for more than just playing Angry Birds of other games, I might suggest something else, but for limited play time, it's perfect!

Reviews.Title: Gift for grandson
Reviews.Author: kmgmanag
Reviews.Content: He loves it and his Mom says it is awesome.  A great starter tab that does way more than you would expect.

Reviews.Title: Not a new product
Reviews.Author: Christi Hudson "C. Hudson"
Reviews.Content: I received this not only late but I also received a used product. In the purchase ad it stated "new". Whenn I got the tablet it had a used screen protector on it and once I took the protector off it has 2 small bubbles under the glass! I am not a happy customer at all! This is suppose to be a Christmas gift for my son!

Reviews.Title: great for kids
Reviews.Author: D.Z
Reviews.Content: My five year old loves his tablet It's the perfect size for little hands and its cute too!. My son uses it to play and for learning, it is easy enough for him to use with little guidance. The internet search engine is slow, so I don't recommend it to someone who actively uses it. Definitely will be buying another for my niece!

Reviews.Title: Speaker cut out after two weeks
Reviews.Author: allischarn
Reviews.Content: Bought for my special needs son to watch movies and netflix.  The speaker which was weak to start scrapped out in two weeks. Trying Roget an external speaker.

Reviews.Title: 7' Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Todd Holt
Reviews.Content: Good Product in good condition when I received it and all the accessories were there and it all works well.Thanks Again,

Reviews.Title: Zee pad
Reviews.Author: Srf2004
Reviews.Content: This tablet was a gift price very good screen touch response seem to be really good. I recommend it to anyone. Great for a starter tablet.

Reviews.Title: WHERE IS IT??!!?
Reviews.Author: angie
Reviews.Content: I was super excited when I found this item and ordered it. Seemed like a great product at a great price. My 9 year old daughters net book got broken a few months back so this was the perfect "big" gift from Santa. Christmas came and gone......NO TABLET! I HAVE NEVER been so devastated...I mean how do you explain something like this to a child? If this turns out to be a scam, I don't know how these people sleep at night, ripping people off knowing most likely this gift is for s child. My Christmas was totally screwed up because of this....times are tough and I don't have hundreds n thousands of dollars to spend on gifts. That's why I was so thrilled when I found this at what seemed like such a good deal. Like I said, this was to be my baby girls main gift. She has taken it really well and is waiting so patiently for it to arrive. It just breaks my heart and burns me up when she asks everyday if its coming today. I'm hanging on to a shred of hope that it will still be delivered, but after reading some of the other reviews I have little hope left....I've heard of these things happening to other people, but have never experienced anything like this...it is an awful feeling to totally put yourself out there(trust, money, ...)just to be made a fool of. I hope I'm wrong, I pray I receive a package tomorrow, but if not....karma will come around to whomever thought of this coldhearted scam...

Reviews.Title: Don't order!
Reviews.Author: Christine Martin
Reviews.Content: After waiting several weeks, I was told I was not going to receive and they were refunding my money.  While I did get my money back, there is no sense in ordering something that isn't there!

Reviews.Title: BEWARE!!! WIFI DOES NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: Rick Neil
Reviews.Content: Tried everything, I am very technical when it comes to electronics. The Wifi radio does not work in this tablet, screen is horrible and pictures would be better from a disposable camera. YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR. This thing is horrible!

Reviews.Title: cheap quality don't bother
Reviews.Author: lydia parra
Reviews.Content: Not worth trying to save a few bucks and the quality proves this. It's slow,  freezes, touch screen sometimes just doesn't respond.  Don't bother...

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: taneisha
Reviews.Content: I just got this zeepad 7 4.2 android tablet I must say it's a good tablet for surfing the web,facebook,YouTube,and great for gaming I would recommend this tablet to anyone oh yeah a great e-reader too!!

Reviews.Title: not for kids
Reviews.Author: Lindsey
Reviews.Content: Because of the price, we purchased two of these for our kids. Within two weeks the first on broke. now 1 month later, the second one is done for. Both were dropped on the VERY SENSITIVE power on/off button, braking the button right. I claim some responsiblity but very poor design.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: The item never mad it to my door. I end up ordering another one through another seller and it is okay for the price. I got it for my son who is 5 and it freezes up alot and the battery goes dead quickly. The charger stop working and I cannot find a case that fits it.

Reviews.Title: This product stinks!
Reviews.Author: amk3mom
Reviews.Content: As stated with the red one.  It is cheaply made, the buttons do not work and we have to share one charger as one we received won't charge.  Do not buy!

Reviews.Title: Don't buy.
Reviews.Author: Maritza Kreutzer
Reviews.Content: I was hesitating to buy it, because of the reviews. It was a gift for a friends 2yr old son to watch cartoons and play toddler games. I took a chance that one that will be shipped to me wont be defective. But it was. Touch screen  was unresponsive in about 1inch wide column. So I had to return it. Before I did I tried to install some apps and connect to wifi with no problem. So, bottom line is, invest in better tablet or take your chances.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad tablet
Reviews.Author: pedro lizarraga
Reviews.Content: This tablet did not work well from the beginning nor did it hold a charge .amazon was kind enough to give me my money back .for which I thank them very much .dont recommend this tablet the touch despise is  bad too u have to tap it repeatedly to get it to respond the wifi won't stay on either it takes it forever to pick up wifi .its got a mind of its own .

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money!
Reviews.Author: House momma
Reviews.Content: Bought 4 of these for christmas presents. 3 of the 4 will no longer charge. 2 of the 4 had the on/off button and volume buttons completely fall off. They are basically trash and unusable. These stayed in a protective case and were taken care of when the buttons fell out. What a waste!

Reviews.Title: Maybe okay for kids but spend a little more on yourself...
Reviews.Author: Jeep Man
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews and looked at the specs and everything looked good but honestly I'm pretty disappointed with this tablet.  It lags terribly on typing and even on a a fast wifi connection it still seems pretty slow at times.  I'm going to look at spending a bit more and getting something better.

Reviews.Title: Bang for the Buck
Reviews.Author: Ginger Simpson "mizging"
Reviews.Content: Other than the screen resolution being a bit fuzzy, I thought this was well worth the money spent.  It was a gift for my grandson (nine and autistic) and he loves it.

Reviews.Title: the product was not vey well made
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my son,he loved it it had everything that he wanted on it!!!! it lasted a month and broke.....The power button broke and it no longer works and the company that i bought it through would not even respond to my e-mail.... so very disappointed with this product ...

Reviews.Title: Charger cord dose not work
Reviews.Author: Tracy
Reviews.Content: The tablet is fine but the charger cord that came with it dose not work I would like to recive a new charger cord and not have to pay the $15 to order a new one I already paid almost $70 for the tablet that should have had a working charger with it.

Reviews.Title: this product is no good
Reviews.Author: Maribel Lebron
Reviews.Content: This product came defective. it freezes alot and changes sites on its own. Now i want to return it and either exchange it or get my money back. I have to wait for the company, engine 29, to respond back and approve my return. This really sucks. It was suppose to be a christma gift now the person has to wait longer for a gift because it came defective.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: This product is no worth it price it freezes all the time I got it for my sisters kids and they couldn't even do anything with it. Every time they clicked on a n application the thing froze then the battery was horrible it was only good for 10 mins this is not a good product and there were no way to get a case for it either.

Reviews.Title: The product came on time
Reviews.Author: kane
Reviews.Content: I got the Zee pad for my 15yr old and she loves it. the apps are easy to install. I brought 4 Zee Pad

Reviews.Title: A Seriously Good Deal for a Surprising Little Tablet
Reviews.Author: Shoof "trice di cinema"
Reviews.Content: My wife has a Google Nexus 7 tablet and the latter is my only frame of reference for functionality and quality.I purchased (3) Zeepads for my grandchildren and they arrived 12/22/12 instead of the scheduled 12/21.  All were about 85% charged.  Each Zeepad connected to my wi-fi home network in a matter of seconds.  Touch screen was responsive and a breeze to navigate.  I am pleasantly surprised with the overall build quality and remarkable functionality of the Zeepad.While not as fast as the Google Nexus 7, which has a hotter Arm Holdings designed processor, the Zeepad's speed is quite adequate.  I was drawn to the Zeepad since its processor is also an Arm design and the Android operating system is tough to beat.  Image or screen quality is inferior to the Nexus but decent.  The difference can be noticed when viewing the screen from an angle, but as long as the view of the Zeepad is straight on, the quality is good, not great.  To put the review in perspective, remember the Zeepad is well below $100 and, at this price point, I think this product is a real value.  Actually, it is a remarkable surprise.  My grandkids opened these on Xmas Eve and within seconds were connected to the net and gazing at more apps (mostly free games) on GooglePlay, where android apps are offered in abundance.  Did not experience any slowness as mentioned in some reviews.  Perhaps the network? Durability is an unknown since we have had the Zeepads for just few days so I'll follow up in a month or so.  While I was very skeptical that a tablet would do all the things claimed, after seeing the Zeepad in action, I wish I would have grabbed one for myself!

Reviews.Title: Frozen
Reviews.Author: Arrie
Reviews.Content: The first week this item worked fine, but after one week it it began freezing up.  Sent back to company.

Reviews.Title: Received a USED Zeepad!!!!!
Reviews.Author: I am 4 YHWH r u
Reviews.Content: I ordered in in Dec., it arrived Jan. 17th.  The first sign that this was not going to go well was the way it was packaged...or the lack of packaging.  LOL.  The tablet comes in the box that you would find it in any retail store, then it had only one layer of bubble wrap covered by a layer of packing tape. What kind of a company packs like this???  (it is not packed into a shipping box).It only gets worse, the screen is extremely scratched, and raised above the frame on one side, and it had a half worn sticker on it.  The WIFI must be within 2 feet in order to connect...but the browser doesn't work anyway.  Also the unit will not charge at all if the tablet is turned on.Despite all this we were able to download a couple of games that did work well and were a ton of fun at first, that is until they started to freeze up.I contacted the company on the 18th, and they responded back saying the item is new and "show us a photo where is the scratches.thanks!".  So I replied back with pictures.Next they agreed it was scratched and offered to send me "the film" to repair it and a new charger.There is so much wrong with this Zeepad that a screen and a charger wouldn't come close to fixing it.  I replied back that I did not pay full price for a used, disfunctional tablet that I would have to fix.Their last response was just one short sentence..."pls ship back we refund you.thanks"Evidently they also want me to pay to ship this useless, previously returned item.  It is so disappointing.  Hopefully they aren't planning to ship it off to the next unsuspecting person.Hmmm, I guess when I get back home I will need to dig out the layer of bubble wrap they used to box it???  I just don't have time to deal with stuff like this...how disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Don't Purchase from this company!
Reviews.Author: TNB "TNB"
Reviews.Content: Tablet stop working the first day i received it. 4GB is a lie, more like 1GB. I don't know if buying the TF card will help the limited storage problem, but it pisses me off because i can't download movies for my kids! I haven't allowed it to charge the recommended initial six hours, but battery drains very quickly! The return policy is ridiculous, 20-50% restocking fee for items that aren't defective is highway robbery! This company(Engine29) has a problem not the tablets. I've heard nothing but good things about the Zeepads, so i can only assume that they knowingly sell damaged products. It's suspicious to me, my items arrived without warranty info, generic user manuel, and no information on the product or on the user manuel about the maker of the product. Amazon suggested i "Bing or Google"(no lie) the maker, they only had an email address for Engine29. I'm greatly disappointed that Amazon doesn't have more info on who they do business with.

Reviews.Title: It didn't work consistently....My son couldn't wait for me to send it back!
Reviews.Author: Raina
Reviews.Content: It Froze.Wouldn't shut down.Was very slow.Didn't pick up quickly.Camera was not good.Son was very dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: Virtually unknown.
Reviews.Author: Jason Thomas
Reviews.Content: While this device has performed okayish for the past few days since we got it, there is no information on the manufacturers or support what so ever! the device has no serial number, no fcc id and no way to contact the manufacturer for support. Already experiencing a few crashes and poor battery performance.

Reviews.Title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY1
Reviews.Author: dawson1mama
Reviews.Content: I ordered 3 zeepads one for each of my kids.  They recieved them for Christmas.  Not one of them made 3 weeks.  They would turn on and you could see backlighting on the screen but no picture.  I could excuse one not working, but not all three.  The first one broke 4 days after we got it.  Returned all 3.

Reviews.Title: Very Mad and upset
Reviews.Author: Tracie Tramell
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed in the tablets. Both of them flicker and one of them all the components are offset. The seller wants me to pay shipping back to them for him to look at them and see if i am telling the truth and if so then he will repair them. I feel like he should have offered to send us 2 new ones with pre-paid labels to return the other two or to do a pick up for them and refund my money. I have went round and round with this seller and I am very very pissed due to I have 2 very unhappy children due to this was there valentine's gift. Seller say I have only 10 days to return them and since I only get paid twice a month I do not have the money to pay for them to be return. Just very very dissatisfied and not sure if I will ever purchased anything like this again. One it has been a nightmare back and fourth with emails to get them return. It is costing me money to return them when they were defected when the seller ship them to me and he made me like I was a liar when saying if they are doing what I said he would repair them. REALLY!!!! repair them. I am a point I don't know what to do except to accept that I am gonna be out $180.00 bucks that I cannot afford. I have a child with cancer and lupus and is taking 23 pills a day. In the hospital at least every other month and all i wanted was her to have something to occupy her when she was stuck in the house for days at a time due to she has no immune system and when she was in the hospital. I should have just spent the extra money and went to a local store and bought one that way if there was a problem all I had to do is drive over there and get the problem solved. Very unhappy customer and this was my first time to purchase amazon and just may have to be my last.Sincerely,Tracie Tramell

Reviews.Title: not what I thought it would be
Reviews.Author: Jacktut
Reviews.Content: most of the tablets that I see in similar price are alot faster, I purchased my tablet a few weeks before christmas 2012 and to be honest I am not that satisfied with it. in the original posting it states that its super fast but this thing force closes most apps, and as well I had to restore it to factory setting a few times now. I will never buy a certain item for the color ever again. its made very cheap and the touch screen part isn't glued down right. but hey for under $100 not too bad if you can deal with force closes and such.

Reviews.Title: Bad, bad, bad, just awful
Reviews.Author: Myroslava M.
Reviews.Content: Freezes on almost every website I go to, nothing works, it's slow and looking at screen for some reasons hurts my eyes. I wish I never bought it. There's a reason why expensive good tablets are expensive and this one is cheap.

Reviews.Title: Okay Product
Reviews.Author: Verdelia Burks
Reviews.Content: This is a good tablet for children. It does freeze up and you have to switch it off to standby and on again to unfreeze it quite regularly. Not sure who to call or where to go to fix this, as there was no customer service number provided with the packaging. I purchased it for my 11 year old and her only complaint was the freezing. It takes decent pictures and you can access and download all apps and watch youtube videos.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy with Purchase
Reviews.Author: Agnes
Reviews.Content: very short battery life ... does not have usb port so the case I purchased with keyboard that has a usb is useless.....

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: D. Peterson
Reviews.Content: First off I am pretty sure this was refurbished....Secondly like few other people have said, the screen till start coming off in one of the corners, not sure what kind of cheap stuff they are using but it doesn't hold.Screen rotates too much if you ask me but thats not the killer for this its all the other things.Woke up this morning and the screen was peaking out a little and something have gotten underneath it, the screen got cracked while trying to get it out........

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Realword
Reviews.Content: For the first 2 weeks, the Zeepad was a God-send.  It has great games, skype, netflix, etc.  But I noticed the battery life becoming less and less.  Now after a whopping 5 weeks, the battery life on this tablet is about 1 hour after being fully charged.  Of course, the people at Zeepad cannot be reached.  I do not recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Won't stand the test of kids
Reviews.Author: Chelsea
Reviews.Content: Truth be told, most of the tablets in the >$80 range are all the same crappy tablet, just a different brand name and price. AVOID Allwinner, .TABNero, Zeepad, Chromo, Tagital, Matricom and ZTO. We have been through several since Christmas but these light weight tablets have charging issues (even with a two port option) and do not stand up more than 4 months of daily use. Great tablet for a grandma just getting started out, not so much for a family setting. Bumped or dropped a few times and you will be looking for a new one.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0 Allwinnwer a13 Boxchip Cortex A8 Android 4.0, 4GB Capacity
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these and 1 of them the sound did not work and there is an area on the screen that doesn't work.  I contacted the seller and they told me how to do a factory reset on it which I tried and it did not work.  They told me then to call Worry Free Gadgets which I called and left a message and nobody has yet to call me back.  The one that works is very nice.  I am concerned though with the one that doesn't work and if I will even get a call back.

Reviews.Title: bad experience
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: They shipped it late, it was received late and as my husband took it out of the box on christmas the screen was lifting on the corner. I did not expect a ipad but this Product is very low grade and seller is not recommended

Reviews.Title: Blah
Reviews.Author: DannyDevito
Reviews.Content: Nice color, but thats where the good ends. The damn thing freezes constantly. The LCD quality is pretty bad (think mid 2k's cell phone screens). They for some dumb reason put the phone version of android on, so it is constantly searching for cell signal even in airplane mode. You get about 30min of battery life due to this. Upon research, this is a common problem when putting the phone version on a tablet. To fix the issue you have to Root the tablet, and being it's a China tablet, probably not wise as it's almost guranteed to brick it. Save up and get a Kindle etc.

Reviews.Title: Lousy zeepad rendered useless after 1week  never received it.
Reviews.Author: larry powell
Reviews.Content: It stop working  after 1 week machine freezing  unable to open programs.not worth sending for repair I purchased insurance never came in mail.

Reviews.Title: Easy break
Reviews.Author: Ada Rivera
Reviews.Content: This I ten is poorly made. It was dropped once and the case came apart.  It was a gift to my niece, I was embarrassed.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the $60
Reviews.Author: Brenda Fonseca
Reviews.Content: I knew I was going to get something cheap but it is not worth it - I wouldn't even spend $10 for this device.  It was frustrating, slow, wouldn't charge and the screen was very poor quality.  Would rather have spent the money on craft supplies and let me kids play the old fashioned way

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: reinaldo garcia
Reviews.Content: poor image quality in a lot of issues not really happy with this item. picture quality is really bad bad

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware
Reviews.Author: Jamie Elisabeth Mathis
Reviews.Content: My sister bought two of these for my daughters last year for Christmas. The seller was Goodios.  She ordered them in November. The first order never shipped and they refunded her money without sending a note that it didn't ship. She reordered them two weeks before Christmas. They shipped from China and finally arrived in February. Of the two the charger for one didn't work. I wasn't too concerned because we could just use the other one.  After a week the charger won't make a connection with either tablet. It doesn't go all the way in and sit flush. Wish we had known and my sister could have saved some money and bought the girls a present they can actually use!!! I tried contacting the seller but since I didn't by them, there isn't much I can do.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for! "Kds Toy"
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old boy. He loves my I Pad mini so I thought this would make a good starter. He still wants my iPad! The tablet runs slow. You can't play a game or watch a movie because something is always updating. At times the screen dosn't  respond to touch. It has a few glitches. Over all I guess you get what you pay for. It works, and it's cheep enough to let the kids play with it without being worried the caust of repair. If it would have been bought for myself I would send it back! I wish I would've paid the extra and got him a tablet just for kids for around $100.00.

Reviews.Title: Maybe for a child
Reviews.Author: Edgardo Maravilla
Reviews.Content: Maybe this one will satisfy a child and not a full grown person like me. I was thinking of having a tablet without spending much,but this one is now wasted as I cant find any use to it. But my niece may like it. Not recommended for full users(my own opinion only).Please dont ask me any further question or inquiries as I have nothing to share.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk....
Reviews.Author: selcuk mumcu
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my 2.5 yr son thinking he would eventually break it and it would be easy to replace.  However, it did not even last 4 - 5 months.  Battery died!So, my verdict is.  Don't buy it...The old adage holds true:  " I am not rich enough to buy cheap products."I don't know if it has warranty.  I will see if I can get a replacement.  Probably not.

Reviews.Title: Poor excuse for a tablet, for any age user
Reviews.Author: Michelle D.
Reviews.Content: The one star was given because we had to. Pros: Color choice, purchase price  Cons: Poor resolution, slow to load and the charge lasts about an hour. This tablet cannot be operated while plugged in to charger, and a full charge required 8-10 hours. This was sent back, and a better tablet was purchased. Don't waste your time or your money.

Reviews.Title: not recommended
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: You only can use the tablet 20 min or less. Is very slow.Become used and more slow than other pink color.Actually die the tablet and cannot start.dont buy this tablet, dont waste money. buy other brand lenovo, asus, etc.

Reviews.Title: I can't even believe this item is for sale
Reviews.Author: Ajqurs
Reviews.Content: I don't even know where to begin. First off, I've written all of 3 reviews my whole life. Second, this is the worst thing I've ever spent my money on. I bought this only as a device to use as a monitor to watch my baby (through an IP camera). It has the most terrible screen- I can't even waste my time going into detail but it's terrible. I wouldn't recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Marky
Reviews.Content: YES Great price, but you get what you pay for. The wall charger will not fit this product, and it will not install on my PC or laptop. After using the internet and downloading drivers, still will not connect to my computers. With all of this being said the tablet will not charge. As for the few hours I got to use it, it seamed VERY slow. I have an iPad and a ASUS tablet, which work great and are fast. This ZeePad tablet take about 3-4 minutes to load facebook. I bought it off of [...] and they don't offer a return or refund process, so I am stuck with a piece of junk that I will never use. My recommendation is find something else to use.

Reviews.Title: Faulty Touchscreen, sub standard processing
Reviews.Author: Lost Ramblin "lostramblin"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the ZeePad for one purpose, to be wall mounted and run imperihome app to coordinate my home automation system.One App!No browsing, no streaming, no other apps. However, every 3-4 days the unit moves to slow as sludge.  Doesn't clear up until a reboot.  So I decided an automatic reboot would fix it, but the tablet appears as rooted to all rooting applications, except those running on the tablet.Also, the top 5% of the screen has stop functioning to touch inputs.  I could flip the screen over, but then it would effect the navigation buttons.I have another tablet for $80, has a much bigger screen and handles the app without a problem.My advice?  Spend the extra $80 and get a samsung tab 7 inch.

Reviews.Title: dUMBEST THING EVER DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
Reviews.Author: Blessing Duru
Reviews.Content: THIS HAS BROKEN 3 TIMESSSSS LOW QUALITY BAD CAMERA SLOW DEVICE OVERALL YOU HAVE BETTER LUCK IN GETTING AN KINDLE FIRE THIS STUFF IS BULL

Reviews.Title: Not that good
Reviews.Author: Landi
Reviews.Content: U get for waht u pay its ok for the priced do i love it "no" i think it could be great for a lottle kid

Reviews.Title: bad business
Reviews.Author: getitonline
Reviews.Content: this jacked from 59.99 to 67.99 just sitting in my cart overnight.  That's plain greed, and I've yanked a ton of product from my cart everytime this happens.  Goodbye, Greedpad 7.

Reviews.Title: Great for Price- Brought for a 5years old
Reviews.Author: Shall
Reviews.Content: Brought as as Christmas gift, so I had not used it yet. But others that I know gives it high praises.Lady Cancer-Texas

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: bsassy406
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my 5 year old's birthday. He wanted an iPad but I found this to be much more reasonable and offer the same type of apps. It is a little more complicated for him to navigate through, but he catches on so fast he will have it down in no time. You do need a memory card for it. Which is something I am not used to having since we are typically an Apple family. The battery isn't an issue for us since we use it in the car and there is a car charger, and he can plug it up at home.

Reviews.Title: I have a problem!
Reviews.Author: Reginald Anding
Reviews.Content: You just sent two tablets and pink! you did not send the keypads!! and you sent a paper saying due to inventory allocation you are providing me with a free upgrade of dual camera tablet for my purchase of single tablet camera! where is the single tablet and keyboard I hope! please tell me what is wrong!  Reginald Anding

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: mandie
Reviews.Content: The zeepad work as well as my Ipad really good deal for the price. Only thing I don't like is that you cant see the screen from a angle. Its best for front head one viewing. camera was ok and its small enough it slides easily into my purse. my 3 young kids now want one sense they can afford one verses the apple alternative at 400$ over all I would buy this item over again and will for my kids .

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: This gel cover is really nice and goes well with the 7 inch tablet I bought for my step daughter.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Kimler
Reviews.Content: It works like as well as a Ipad with out the cost.  I got me and my sister one and we love them.  Great for travel.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet - Headphones sucked
Reviews.Author: hansueter
Reviews.Content: My 16 month old son is always taking my phone to play on.  I needed something he could play with and I not have to worry about him wrecking it and me being out a lot of money.  This is perfect.  He's dropped it several times, and still no issue.  The back did pop off one time when he dropped it, and it just popped right back on.  It also works for what I need too.  I've used it several times now to do work on.  Obviously there is not much memory so you'll need an extra micro SD, but for the price, I'll take it...I did how ever have an issue with the ear buds that came with it.  There was a nasty dirty finger print on the ear piece.  They weren't the best quality ear buds anyways, but I definitely wasn't using them after that.  I contacted the seller, and they sent me a new set of earbuds in a different brand.  Small issue, but still 100% happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Do I have to give it a star???
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Duckett
Reviews.Content: I bought these for my two daughters for Christmas. One was dropped on Christmas day and has been in a computer repair shop since, he says it is junk.  This I realize, could be due to it being dropped. However the other zeepad I purchased stopped working in late January! It had never been dropped! I know the cost to purchase these tablets was extremely inexpensive, however I would expect them to work for longer than one month. I am highly disappointed in this product!

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware-Horrible piece of junk!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jokergeorge
Reviews.Content: This thing was good for a few days+then it was over.We bought it for our daughter,who handled it with great care,+within days she said the volume didn't work.Then it wouldn't connect to wifi.Then it would frequently freeze up+she can't rectrieve her video+pictures she took of her schoolmates now.The manual is written in broken english+the Square Trade warranty we bought for this(Amazon recommended it)is useless.They just passed the buck right back to the Zeepad manufacturer-which is nearly impossible to get a phone number,or e-mail to contact them- and to Amazon,which hasn't done anything yet.This is a joke all the way around+a complete waste of money,never mind our daughter being heart broken after she waited so long to get a tablet of her own.Don't buy this garbage+skip the "recommended" Square Trade warranty!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet!
Reviews.Author: L. Smith "grammasmitty"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a grandchild. Played with it for a full day, setting it up with Wifi and several apps. It is just a little slower than my Galaxy, but other than that is just a great tablet. Priced well for a child. Connects to internet, display is good. Takes pictures with front camera, wish there was a back camera. Storage is small (4 gb) but can be expanded with a 32 gb mini sd card. Very pleased with this product!

Reviews.Title: Here on time and I love it.
Reviews.Author: Chris Randazzo "Chris Randazzo"
Reviews.Content: It's no iPad, but the system is better. It has Flash, not QuickTime, and the apps are better than on an iPod/iPad. You can easily just pick it up, put it in a case, and take it anywhere. It has a freaking awesome cam as well. I apologize for the first negative rating, as the shipping was great, the boxing was in perf condition, so thanks. c:

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Pink Juice
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Zee Pad for my 4 yr. old and she loves it! I have not had any problems with it (knock on wood) and it is very easy to use. I thought with the price being so low, I would have to struggle to make it perform right, but to my surprise we got a great deal. I would recommend the Zee Pad for anyone looking for a tablet and doesn't want to spend an "arm and leg" for it!

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price
Reviews.Author: rliz22
Reviews.Content: I ordered this so that I could listen to internet radio at work since the AM/FM reception is terrible!  This does everything I need and more.  I'm just figuring out some of the apps I can use and watching videos, looking at photos, etc.  There are some fun games also which is an added bonus.  Works great, volume is good.  I'm sure it's not as fancy as an ipad but it works perfect for me!

Reviews.Title: resets
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: My son got this for Christmas from his grandma. He likes it other then his angry birds games keep resetting. He is getting very frustrated with it now.

Reviews.Title: 7" tablet
Reviews.Author: william hyatt
Reviews.Content: works great, can download all apps.  just as good as an ipad for 1/4th of the cost.  i would suggest this product to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Bought by a mom for a teen
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I just got our zeepad. Thus far, I must write a review on what I am experiencing for other non-tech savvy moms considering this for a kid to use for homework applications. I have it on the charger, and whoo boy! I can tell right from the box that the charger connection is going to be an issue! On the plus side~ there are ample attachments/wires/accessories, for the price. I have a usb adapter, headphones, the charger, and an adapter for the keyboard (keyboard NOT included!). The charging connection is wonky enough to mention to anyone considering this purchase. The price is nice, and I am still optimistic that it will do what I need it to do, but be forewarned on the charger not fitting into the pad snugly. You will have to keep an eye on it and make sure it doesn't get jostled.

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: JeffWeisbaker
Reviews.Content: The keyboard does not pickup correctly sometimes, It cannot find wifi spots and The  keyboardcase i have will not operate when connected to the pad. am think about colntacting the seller about returning it .

Reviews.Title: Basic tablet
Reviews.Author: A, CHRISTIE
Reviews.Content: I havent used an expensive tablet before but this one still seems a little cheap.It works fine but the instructions were written by a foreigner and really donthelp with the use at all. You just have to figure it out as you go which is mostlynot to hard. I havent figured out how to have a favorites list yet.Overall a decent value for the price but dont expect anything like an IPad.

Reviews.Title: Not usable
Reviews.Author: Garry
Reviews.Content: Ok, it is an inexpensive tablet. My biggest problem with it was out of the box it would not turn on. Could not really get a good read on performance. Once it did start it was very slow and response time was horrible. I assume something was amiss with the processor. The absolute great news is the unit was returned and my money credited back without delay. Amazon Rocks!

Reviews.Title: This tablet is horrible
Reviews.Author: A. Burgett
Reviews.Content: This tablet is HORRIBLE!!! Every 2 hours you have to charge it, wi-fi runs REALLY slow, it freezes all the time, and the screen will break if you hardy even drop it. I thought I was getting a good  deal but-NO. I am going to throw this away! Do NOT buy this!!! I am going to buy an apple product (ipad) those are good items.

Reviews.Title: Cheap fabrication
Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: Screen is too slim while time you touch screen with a small pressure and you can see a black spot by your finger ...Battery is holding for 25 min ... It means its usseless .....To slow  TouCh screen most games doesn't feel a touch screenBorough this tablet for my wife only because review said is great tablet -IT'S NOT

Reviews.Title: don't buy this
Reviews.Author: Anna Seeger "the goodbee girl"
Reviews.Content: The tablet came with a cracked screen.  Sent it back right after Christmas. Waiting to hear from vender that he received it.

Reviews.Title: fabulous tablet
Reviews.Author: Charmaine White "CWhite"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 7 yrs grandson. He loves this tablet. This tablet is a good purchase for people who are not tech savvy.  However, sometimes it freezes, but, all you have to do is turn off the tablet and turn back on. Netflix works perfect on this tablet. My grandson downloads lots of games. FYI you might want to invest in a micro SD card for more memory. other than that, this is a fabulous tablet.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad Review
Reviews.Author: Mrs.Ruby Batts
Reviews.Content: The Zeepad was great at first. But after my kids only having them a month the have completely stopped working! I have no idea how to return them and no one is returning my emails. Im livid! I really want my money back!

Reviews.Title: Apps ONLY
Reviews.Author: Aischa
Reviews.Content: For kids, this is tablet is OK, young ones. Anything requiring you to type in more than one box is maddening! This goes for any and all website you were hoping to easily use that require username and password. The tablet is often slow to respond to your finger or pen "clicks", and sometimes jumps ahead or miss-reads what you are trying to do. It could be me, but it has taken me quite some time to set up a few things (again, using passwords and account info and trying to type), over an hour to get Overdrive going (ebooks via the library).Games, are OK. At least the primitive app ones. Video is fine. Reading books on it is fine.Web navigation STINKS. Typing STINKS. You must have patience.

Reviews.Title: Faulty cord
Reviews.Author: Shorty
Reviews.Content: It only worked for a short time however I wouldn't blame it on the product. I blame it on a faulty cord. The company states they will refund me after product is received. If company weren't in China I would have asked for an exchange.  I would just prefer to get a tablet from the states that way if there is a problem it won't take so long to get it to the company for repairs.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: mary becker
Reviews.Content: SLOW SLOW SLOW SLOW SLOW,  times out everytime i try to search and don't even bother trying to download an app .... There is a reason there are so many used zeepads for sale on here.... Cause not one person except a 5yr old wants to keep it

Reviews.Title: suck bad wish I could send it back
Reviews.Author: this thing sucks
Reviews.Content: this zpad sucks bad  do not recommend any one buy it ,,it keep freezing up and I can't even really get it to work

Reviews.Title: Save your MONEY!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Ordered one for a kid I like so I got a second one to test.It lasted 30 minutes!!!Thought I would use this black one (arrived in BLUE) in the car as a cheap map and music player.  Could not get gps to work if it has one.As it started to die the screen began a silver matrix like left to right wave of lighting occurred and then black to never power up again!Not giving the pink one to a kid now.  You get what you pay for!!

Reviews.Title: disappointment.
Reviews.Author: tina
Reviews.Content: I just recieved my tablet and its not working. U can't turn it on. It doesn't charge. Nothing works on it. Total disappointment.

Reviews.Title: defected
Reviews.Author: lissette medina
Reviews.Content: i gave a defected product for christmas. what a disappointment. sent it back and am still waiting for a replacement product.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0 Allwinnwer A13 Boxchip Cortex A8 Android 4.0, 4GB Capacity, 512 MB.Zeepad 7.0 Allwinnwer A13 Boxchip Cortex A8 Andr
Reviews.Author: Diana Bowers
Reviews.Content: This item was purchased for a 16 year old girl.  It worked great Christmas day, then it would not work unless it was plugged in, and it ran slower than molasses.

Reviews.Title: RED Color 7.0 ZEEPPAD(TM) ANDROID 4.0 TABLET 4GB CAPACITY WIFI, CAMERA...
Reviews.Author: Diana Bowers
Reviews.Content: Products do not work properly.  Won't stay on unless plugged in. Very Slow.  Quality just not what I expected. Nice Color and picture.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Battery life is less then 30 minutes. The touch screen doesn't work as well as it should. Some android apps don't work at all.

Reviews.Title: Almost worth it
Reviews.Author: jf "avatar-x"
Reviews.Content: The pad had 3 flaws:1)  Battery life - about enough for 1 full movie on a charge and that's about it2)  The touch wasn't uniformly accurate - for some reason, around the menus and such I had to consistently touch at the top edge; annoying, but I could have lived with it3)  The audio had all kinds of sound artifacts (clicks and such) in it.  This was true for the built-in speaker as-well-as the headphone jack; so it must have been something to do with the sound hardware.I might have chosen to live with issues #1 and #2, but #3 made the pad unusable for anything related to audio and video.  My suggestion.

Reviews.Title: poor quality
Reviews.Author: Judgedread "rsw"
Reviews.Content: this tablet constantly froze up and the battery life is horrible.then when it's changing you have no of its fully charged and it does not cut off automatically when it's finished charging ,still waiting on my refund ,the seller has no contact info except for email and take forever to respond ,don't buy this tablet !!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Not worth my money
Reviews.Author: Dane Brown
Reviews.Content: First let me say that I received this product within a week. This product came from China and the delivery time was good. However, I would not give this product to my worst enemy. The screen (pixels) are horrible. When I received this product the charger did not work. There is a nasty shortage for the charger. The case and the screen is plastic. It's not bright and there is always a glare on the screen. When I was searching for this products, the reviews said they will give to they children, well I wont even give to my children. The only way I recommend to get this product if you just want to give away your money and if so donate the money to your local church or someone who is in need.

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: bug7
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet for my granddaughter for Christmas and she loves it. Great price and works perfectly. I would recommend this tablet to anyone.

Reviews.Title: disappointed....I let them down !
Reviews.Author: Q-Bee "J.Laws..."
Reviews.Content: I purchased two zeepads for my great-grandchildren for Christmas. They arrived on time as promised.  I did my usual research and wrapped the gifts in preparation for their arrival. Unfortunately, neither of the zeepads are being used because BOTH chargers have malfunctioned and are not working . They are not holding the charge . Imagine a seven year old and a ten year old who have been waiting for these zeepads since they first saw them on TV. . We have had someone look at them but to no avail. Please give me some advice if you can....if not, please send me instructions for returning them with anticipation of receiving a full refund. They were purchased on my account and I have got to get moving on replacing them with something else before I lose my cool great-grandmother status

Reviews.Title: nonfunctional
Reviews.Author: novie
Reviews.Content: Able to do certain things. However switches to other items on its own. Listen to music and switches songs on its own. Playing games and freezes up. My overall rating is a 1 even that is to much of a rating

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Erin
Reviews.Content: Item seemed good @ first but quit working after 8hrs ruined my sons Christmas. Filed a claim with Amazon. Hope that the issue will be resolved soon.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Wilfredo Jimenez
Reviews.Content: The product is great for the price paid.  Be aware, battery life is about 2.5hrs (as described), but the screen is very responsive.  It works perfectly and considering its price, it is an excellent buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Engrid Mechele Berry
Reviews.Content: I wanted to wait for a few weeks before writing a review to see if the product would actually work and it does!!!!  I am so very happy because I purchased two of the zeepads for my children for Christmas.  My children are very pleased with the product as well.  It does everything I expected plus alot of things I wasn't expecting.  As far as I am concerned, it is as good as any I-Pad.

Reviews.Title: Great table
Reviews.Author: Bunny
Reviews.Content: Ordered it just before Christmas...got it on time!!!  It was a gift and the person who got it loves it.

Reviews.Title: i need a new one
Reviews.Author: meiko
Reviews.Content: it stopped working after 2 days and i have not recieved my new one ,an i  have not recieved a phone call or nothing

Reviews.Title: I was amazed!!
Reviews.Author: melba burks
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my 18 year old son.  It was inexpensive and I didn't expect much and I was shocked at how much we got! It was well worth every penny.  Easy to use, easy to connect to wifi, easy to download apps too.  Can add external memory if you need.  I would recommend this and I was pleased.  As was my son! My son in law works at Best Buy, and of course is a gadget man and he was impressed.  No it's not an ipad.  But, it is worth the penny if you want to be able to facebook, Skype and watch Netflix with ease.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE.. ITS A CRAP SHOOT!! and we lost!!
Reviews.Author: dawn fillinger
Reviews.Content: This is the thing, The Zeepad came from Goodios and it worked GREAT for exactly 3 hours!! then the wifi wouldn't stay on and the audio went out!! My tech looked at it, and said the wifi card was dead, so I could buy a new one, but since it was less then 5 hours old,send it back!! NOW I did read all of the comments, and this company has a great reputation,but this product when it works for people its fantastic, when it doesn't well I had a tearful child!! So is this the sellers fault? how do i rate this with anything but a 1 when the product failed so miserably even if the seller was fine? I mean i didn't contact the seller amazon did, so im assuming they treated amazon as they would me on that note they get 5 stars, BUT again why are they not testing these tablets out, I mean its a real crap shoot when you buyt this, as you can see some people got lucky and what they bought was awesome, I gambled and lost I bought it crossed my fingers and got a defective one:( i am not going to buy another one, I'm not sure what I'm going to do but this tablet form any of the sellers is not the answer for my family!!I got to my house on time, they DO NEED to package it better!! its in a small box with no bubble wrap or packing material of any kind, and then that box is in another box,(just rattling around) this may be why some are getting cracked screens, plus it(the tablet) was ice cold, I dont know if that would break it, but I'm sure it doesn't help. Maybe that's what happened! For the person who wanted a instructional guide..I got one, it had no adjectives in it, and it didn't help with , why did the sound go out?? so you really dont need one, as everything else is pretty easy to understand, it was funny though!!SO Im giving the tablet 1 star, I rolled a dice, and the seller will get a 5 but for the purposes here, I'm giving it 1 star. So it is definitely buyer BEWARE!! ( I didn't make 2 separate reviews 1 for product 1 for the seller, so I only made this one and included everything!) I do wish I could give the product no stars!!

Reviews.Title: What the heck
Reviews.Author: Eezyboy504
Reviews.Content: Still haven't received my package from these people. My daughter waiting to open her tablet and still not here after 3 days this is BS I AM REALLY upset I want my money back

Reviews.Title: xmas gift.
Reviews.Author: jaymoe "value shopper"
Reviews.Content: So far I have not opened it but the 5 star is for the shipper. They were FAST!!!. Got it in 3 days

Reviews.Title: Wonderful little tablet
Reviews.Author: Phillip Arnett
Reviews.Content: Wonderful little tab. I have given these to 3 of my 4 grandchildren. They have found them easy to use and understand. A protective face would be nice however. The young ones are quite a bid harder on the screen. They are only 5,4 and 21/2 years old !!

Reviews.Title: Very nice little tablet
Reviews.Author: jorge a. rivas
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these tablets, for my three boy and they love these tablets, don't have trouble connecting to the internet or using them, the camera is not an excellent camera that can take pictures of a 5 mp camera, so don't be thinking you can use the camera to take quality pictures  But a lot of more expensive tablets out there have the same quality cameras. they are well build my youngest boy has drop his a few times and still working good. for the price this was a good deal and yes I will recommend it to any body.

Reviews.Title: Cheap junk
Reviews.Author: Fred Friendly
Reviews.Content: I purchased 4 of these and after using them for a couple of months I can honestly say they are absolute crap.Pros:Has Google Play and plays YouTube.Andriod seems to be stable and we have had few crashes.Performance is reasonable for a sub $100 tablet.Wifi seems to be stable and does not drop out but signal receptions is relatively weak.Cons:The screen is very easily scratched.  The manufacturer apparently knew this and included a screen protector.  However, the protector is of very low quality and peels off and/or develops air bubbles after a few days.One of the units had some problems with the internals and if you put your finger on back it in a specific spot it would create a distortion pattern on the screen in the front.One unit was DOA.  The touch screen had a dead spot (which happened to line up with the "S" key on the onscreen keyboard making it unusable.  In general, the touch screens are of low quality.  All of them have manufacturing defects like embedded dust particles in the plastic (that become evident after installing the screen protector)  indicating they were produced in a low quality facility.The power button on one of the units has already failed and no longer powers on or off the unit.The screen is a critical feature of a tablet and this one fails miserably on all counts.  It is cheap Chinese crap and should be avoided.I got frustrated and purchased a Nextbook in Walmart for the same price as one of these units and the difference in quality is astounding.  The Nextbook is light years ahead of the Zeepad.

Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Operation is inconsistent.  Freezes up too much. USB port appears to only be for charging. Touch screen response is inconsistent. Internet access is only by WIFI.  Doesn't appear to be upgradeable (hardware, ram). Cool idea for a beginning tablet/device for a preteen or displaying video work. The price is attractive but don't look to be too impressed once you receive it. Instruction booklet was poorly put together.  My ten year old daughter has better composition.  Packaging, presentation and operation make it reminiscent of a "knockoff" or "bootleg". I guess you buy cheap, you get cheap!

Reviews.Title: SO ANGRY
Reviews.Author: Eileen Traynor
Reviews.Content: I ORDERED FOUR ZEEPADS FOR MY FOUR CHILDREN! WELL ON THE INFROMATION BY THE SELLER IT SAYS SKYPE ON IT WHICH DOESNT WORK.! I WAS SUP. TO RECIEVE IT ON THE 21ST OF DECEMBER, I NEVER RECIEVED THEM ON THAT DATE AND WROTE TO THE SELLER. THEY DIDNT EVEN HAVE THR CURTOUSY TO LET ME KNOW IT WASNT GOING TO COME UNTIL THE 24TH. THEN ONE OF THEM DOESNT WORK AT ALL IT FREEZES EVERY TWO SECONDS, AND WROTE ONCE AGAIN TO SELLER AND NO REPLY, NOW MY SON HAS TO NOT HAVE ONE OF HIS CHRISTMAS PRESENTS BECAUSE I HAVE TO RETURN IT AND GET ANOTHER ONE AND PRAY THAT THIS NEW ONE I AM SENT WORKS. THIS WAS SUPOSED TO BE A NEW ITEM, AND IN NO WAY DOES IT LOOK NEW IT LOOKS USED. THIS SELLER IS NOT PROFESSIONAL AND DOES NOT CARE IF THE CUSTOMERS ARE SATISFIED. WHEN YOU LOOK AT THE PRODUCT FROM THEM IT SAYS CERTAIN THINGS LIKE SKYPE BUT IT DOESNT DO THE SKYPE VIDEO OR IT JUST FREEZES. SO NOW I AM WONDERING HOW LONG WILL IT TAKE FOR MY 9YEAR OLD TO GET ANOTHER ONE FROM THE SELLER WHEN IT IS RETURNED. UGH NOT HAPPY AT ALL! HOPEFULLY THEY WILL GET BETTER CUTOMER SERVICE AND SEND A NEW ONE ASAP I WILL BE SENDING IT OUT ON 01/02 LETS HOPE THIS PROCESS IS FAST AND WE ACTUALLY RECEIVE A WORKING ZEEPAD AND MAYBE THE PROGRAMS THAT ARE PROMISED AS WELL. I WOULD NEVER RECOMMEND THIS SELLER

Reviews.Title: disappointed !
Reviews.Author: dbrunetti
Reviews.Content: purchased two , one seems to be working fine but the other not so much....screen freezes constantly and not responsive to touch. theres nothing worse than giving a child something christmas morning and have it work so poorly...trying to contact seller and exchange , i will give them the benefit of the doubt that this one was a fluke , but as of day one not happy at all !!

Reviews.Title: Very Dissatisfied!!
Reviews.Author: Elle
Reviews.Content: I wish I could give no star at all. I returned this piece-of-crap after 2 hours of use. Viewing angle is poor, headphone jack didn't even accommodate the cheap earbuds that comes with it. Sound is barely audible and lastly, I'm getting the run-around about my refund. DO NOT waste your time purchasing this crap.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!
Reviews.Author: DuneMommy
Reviews.Content: My daughter saved her money and bought this tablet for herself...We LOVE it!! It is pretty fast and works great for what she wants. I'm hoping my husband gets me one for Christmas

Reviews.Title: Piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Jason Berry
Reviews.Content: Save your money. this thing is cheap and worthless. its super slow. quality is terrible, stuff dont work on it. super confusing, if you are a first time tablet owner dont buy this. would not recommend to anyone

Reviews.Title: Take care of it.
Reviews.Author: Marina
Reviews.Content: My mom bought this tablet for my super spoiled little sister. And yeah, its a kid tablet. I thought it would be more durable.But my seven year old sister dropped it. And the screen cracked. Only a white screen. It went blank. So I recommend anyone buying this to invest in a case. And now she wants to take my laptop and possibly destroy it.She's a destroyer!

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Yessenia
Reviews.Content: I have not recived it yet and its been over a month it going to be 2 months almost since I placed my order and have not recived it.

Reviews.Title: zeepad tablet
Reviews.Author: crystal lee lopez
Reviews.Content: ORDERED THESE FOR MY CHILDREN.. ONE OF THEM THE CAMERA DIDNT WK..BUT THEY WERE KIND ENOUGH TO SEND ME ANOTHER ONE WHEN I SENT MINE BK.. FAST SERVICE AND ALWAYS RESPONDS TO UR EMAILS..I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS SELLER .. AND HOPE TO PURCHASE MORE PRODUCTS IN THE NEAR FUTURE..

Reviews.Title: This its good n its real!!..
Reviews.Author: JAIR
Reviews.Content: Me gusta kede satisfecho con la compra.. buen producto y no tuve ningun problema con el envio todo como lo explican es cierto ademas de muy buen precio... Like it...

Reviews.Title: Wi-Fi doesn`t work
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: The wi-fi only worked for a couple of hours...then just didn`t work anymore. There is not a user manual to try to fix it.
